Piko Interactive later reaching out to Mukunda, and he agreed to fix the game and get it to work on the console. It then was released as part of Super 4 in 1 Multicart on December 14th, 2013.

The objective of this game is to move all three characters to the EXIT in each level. Each character has 2 limited special abilities that you must use to solve a variety of puzzles. The in-game status bar displays the name of each ability and how many times it can be used during that level.

name: Skeletris
summary: A casual roguelike with Tetris vibes.

name: Skin & Bones
summary: Two unlikely friends are thrown together by the Wizard to retrieve his magical gems. Skin is fast and agile, Bones is slow but tough. Use their different abilities and work together as you journey through strange and wonderful worlds.

name: Skyclimbers
summary: Build your kingdom, choose your class, and tame monsters in this Multiplayer City-Building/Open-World Action RPG that takes place in a procedurally generated anime-themed metaverse.

name: Skeletal Avenger
summary: A rogue-lite hack'n'slash rushing head first into battle! Crawl through dungeons, gain new gear, experiment with perks and slay the foul beings blocking your way. Become a reanimated skeleton and ascend from the gloomy depths to settle a deadly grudge!

name: Sky Jaguar 2
summary:
Sky jaguar 2 is a frantic game that will test your reflexes as a player. Several alien races have risen to war, and only you can face the threat. You are the best pilot in the galaxy and this is a good time to prove it. No one is going to help you. You are alone against thousands of enemies who will destroy you. 
They are 3 different types of weapons. Choose which of them is the most suitable for each situation. Collect all kind of items to help you in your mission; missiles, speed, extra weapons... Everything is against you, but you are a hero, and the heroes always win.

name: Skitt
summary: Skitt is a first person shooter game that tells the story as a visual novel. Choose the character that best suits your way of playing and protect your refuge from a devastating parasite.

name: Skopje
summary: Explore a city thrust into disarray by an unknown event and survive the hordes of mutated abominations that lurk at every corner. You’ll have to fight through enemies & bosses, scavenge loot and survive the hostile city.

name: Skyseeker
summary: Skyseeker is a monster-collecting metroidvania where every enemy is catchable. Enter a world where ancient creatures thrive in a world lost to time. As a Skyseeker, join the legendary explorers who tame these monsters and attempt to reach the fabled summit of the sky.

name: Sky Squadron
summary: Jump into the gunner seat and save your island paradise from the evil invading empire! "Sky Squadron" is an Aussie twist on "Star-Fox" meets VR.

name: Skycadia
summary: The world of Skycadia is overrun with sky pirates -- and there's profit to be made! Take to the skies and collect bounties by shooting down the scoundrels in this light-hearted flying adventure.

name: Skator Gator
summary: Skator Gator is a lane-based 2D platformer starring a gator fighting back against a corporation that's polluted his home and the surrounding areas.

name: Skapp
summary: A skateboarding video game in which you control your board by performing tricks with your phone's gyroscope and your gamepad.

name: Skelets
summary: skelets is a local multiplayer skeleton brawler. Plunder gems as you fight other skeletons. Use different weapons to dig into the terrain and collect your treasure. First to steal all the diamonds wins!

name: Sketchy.Academy
summary:
Sketchy is a free web-based multiplayer game.
Each players make drawings that are passed and guessed from player to player, chinese whispers style.
At the end you get to see they've become: hearty laughs are guaranteed!

name: Skellboy Refractured
summary: Play as Skippy, the square, flexible skeleton in this cute Action-RPG, to keep a heartbroken court magician from destroying the world with his army of monsters and undead! Change out your body parts with those of enemies and friends and become the hero of Cubold Kingdom!

name: Skaza
summary:
SKAZA - online multiplayer social strategy game from the found chronicle ... Since ancient times, fabulous creatures goblin, kikimors, swamp spirits and many others have always helped ordinary wanderers and heroes. They gave them gifts in every possible way and supported them in their development. And there was an idyll between people and creatures, everyone lived in peace and harmony. But over time, more and more people began to be attracted and interested in the wealth of fairy-tale heroes. Because of human greed and cruelty, the first disagreements arose. People began to enslave creatures with impunity. Greed and lust for profit overshadowed their minds. And then Perun decided to protect the creatures from people and endowed them with incredible strength and abilities to protect humans from the misfortune. He split the old world and created several new ones, scattered riches over unknown distances, which the creatures reliably guarded. 
 
The strategic component of the game is determined by two main conditions: 
1. There are two types of interaction between players in the game. Either the player becomes a prince and develops by capturing and surrounding locations belonging to other players, or he becomes a fiefdom and at these locations is mining items and materials. In fact, this is a symbiosis, some players are engaged in mining, others protect them by receiving profit from them, while they jointly expand their possessions by spreading their influence to other principalities and cities. The mechanics of capturing and surrounding locations is a separate game, reminiscent of a game of "dots" on a large spherical world with a size of 25,000 hexagons. 
 
 
2. Players, through close social interaction, identify leaders who are appointed to govern cities and states as a whole. Such players, while occupying positions, have mechanisms at their disposal to manage the economy of the game. They also develop a strategy for the development of the state as a whole, dictating foreign and domestic policies and the conditions for the existence of the players themselves in it. Such appointments occur weekly, so the dynamics of development in the game depends entirely on the correctness of the actions of the gaming community, as well as on the insight and wisdom of the rulers. 
 
In the game, the strategy is the main point, however, in addition to this, all the basic familiar mechanics are implemented, grind for grinders, battle for battles, sandbox for sandstone, casual for casual, craft for crafters, etc., but made with a new look at making games. Everything here is comfortably balanced and everyone will find for themselves what they need.

name: Sketchbots
summary: Hone your programming skills through a series of increasingly complex challenges in which you use a node based language to guide your robot through the required goals.

name: Skulldash
summary: Skulldash is a megawad and time-trial styled gameplay mod for GZDoom (3.2.0 and higher) created by Joshua O'Sullivan (Dragonfly). The original version, containing 32 levels, was released on 22 October, 2015, and ran on the Zandronum source port. This first release went on to win one of the 22nd Annual Cacowards.

name: Skulldash Expanded Edition
summary: In 2017, an expansion pack to Skulldash, entitled Skulldash: Expanded Edition was released, allowing the mod to be played in GZDoom, and featuring an additional eighteen levels created by O'Sullivan and various mappers from across the Doom community. The mod is intended to be played using the OpenGL renderer, with the effects of the software renderer ranging from sub-optimal visuals to major graphical glitches on some maps.

name: Skiing
summary:
Skiing is a 1-4 player sports game that was released a year after Coleco discontinued the system.

The two events are Slalom (pass between a set number of gates) and Downhill (avoid moguls on the course), and the objective is to finish in the quickest possible time.

name: SkyPrimal
summary: Having lost your tribe, you, as the sole survivor, find yourself in an era of deadly danger and exciting adventures. You have to build yourself a shelter, make weapons, protect yourself from wild animals, and prove that you are not a prey, but a predator.

name: Ski Stunt Simulator
summary:
Ski Stunt Simulator is a realistic physics-based simulation of acrobatic ski stunts with intuitive "mouse gesture" controls.

The player has to ski down a slope, perform certain stunts and land safely. If you succeed the crowd will cheer, if you crash the crowd emphatically yells out "aah". Ski Stunt Simulator was first released as a online Java game/experiment. Later it was released for Windows with more features and levels and better graphics.

The first Java web based game only has 4 stages: kicker jump, crash & burn, the wall and practise. The Windows version has 23 stages divided over 4 difficulty levels: trainer, beginner, intermediate and professional. The Windows version also has additional features like collapsing cliffs and bridges, falling boulders, a bombshell and a jet pack

You control the posture of the skier through the X and Y position of the mouse cursor. Move the mouse up and the skier straightens out, move down and he’ll crouch. Move left or right and he’ll lean forward or backward. The simulation interpolates every mouse position in between, making the skier move from one posture to another in fluid and natural movements.

name: Skull's Impossible Quest
summary: Skull’s Impossible Quest is a physics-based hack-and-slash story. Swinging the players weapon using the mouse will build up velocity which translates to damage. The game also contains dialog trees, ragdoll physics, and collectables.

name: Ski Jump Challenge
summary: Become a star of ski jumping hills in this crazy sport game!

name: Skateboarding: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade
summary:
Do your best and skate to get a high score in this 2D side scrolling skateboarding game from Breakthrough Gaming! As a skater, you'll need to perform tricks in the skate park to score points! So what will the score be for your run this time?

The lesson for this game is: God wants us to enjoy this life He's given us and to have fun doing the right thing! Skateboarding in real life and in a video game can be lots of fun, so that's a way you can enjoy the life God has given you! So live for God and don't forget to have fun! Check out Psalm Chapter 118 in the Bible to read more about this!

name: Sky Fleet
summary: Take to the skies as part of the Sky Fleet, defend sacred floating islands, build strong bases and towers to protect their resources, as well as shoot down waves of rogue drones trying to strip-mine them!

name: Skyland Rush: Air Raid Attack
summary: A shooting rush game against creatures of the dark! Shoot and fly through the sky of Skylandia in an epic adventure. How far can you get? Dash into the world and challenge your skills in this side-scrolling game! Features: - Shoot as many creatures as possible to increase your score - Use powerful charms to upgrade your weapons - Beware of puzzling traps in your skyway - Explore action-packed game blocks of elevating difficulty - Complete challenging missions and claim the rewards - Brace yourself, Guardians may toughen your journey - Collect egglings to unlock "Awakening" and to meet the Titans Evil has taken over Skylandia! Zenya needs your help! Survive the sneaky attacks of various bugsters, ominous witches, robobirds, little devils and other notorious monsters that will threaten your mission! Shoot'em up to clear your way and claim the rewards. A long journey lies ahead, dark times shall not prevail! Tap and balance though dense vegetation, blocking rocks and dangerous caves! Collect powerful charms to wipe out all the enemy creatures with your super weapons. Avoid or smash the obstacles and spot the hidden traps ahead so that you can disable them in time. During your epic adventures, different types of egglings will come across your path! Each one of them is an ill-omen of an evil presence! Collect them all while monstrous Titans await to be awakened! Join Zenya's journey to the adventurous Skylandia!

name: SketchFighter 4000 Alpha
summary: SketchFighter 4000 Alpha is a scrolling shooter with a focus on exploration for Mac OS X.

name: Skelost
summary: Skelost tells the tale of a valiant hero determined to find his long lost family. Explore a vast kingdom where you’ll encounter treacherous creatures and even meet a friend or two, all in a unique art style!

name: Sky Septima
summary: Through the clouds and asteroids, follow the Bard on his quest of fetching the Star in the name of love. Unleash the power of magical instruments, surf the beat and span across a little town, cloud kingdom and outer space. But be prepared for the Three Kings guarding the path. Beat them with grace, style, and music!

name: Sketchy Snowboarding
summary: Sketchy Snowboarding is a hand drawn infinite snowboarder where no two runs are the same. Carve, ollie, grab, grind, and spray folklore beasts to progress through 100 unique challenges. The rules are simple: Carve to the left of red gates. Carve to the right of blue gates. Don't run into stuff. Send it deep. The "art", sound, and code was created in Colorado and outdoors whenever possible. This project kept me sane during a skateboarding injury in 2018 and I hope you have as much fun playing it as I did making it.

name: Skelly Selest & Straimium Immortaly Double Pack
summary: This bundle contains two wonderfully outlandish indie treasures from retro-inspired UK developer, Caiysware. Skelly Selest: a score-attack slash dash run ‘n’ gun-athon that places players in the skeletal shoes of a Heavenly Keeper. Only the Selestial Order can defeat the sinful horrors that lurk in the depths of Hell. Different modes: trials, survival, boss rush, card game, and more! Visit the Bone Plains, Flesh Gardens, and other locations across a pixel-art hellscape Wield blessed items, weapons, and armor to survive Rescue a variety of unlockable character classes and spiffy hats Straimium Immortaly: bosses and beasties abound in this vibrant roguelite/shump/dungeon crawler hybrid that pits you against the monster-filled rooms of the Cubicus. Explore the bizarre, procedurally generated world of the Cubicus Wield an arsenal of 25+ upgradeable weapons and 50+ items Discover and harness a variety of mysterious ninja abilities Unlockable classes, mutators, cheats and hats

name: Skategirl Destroys the Universe
summary: A game played on TV screens floating in a surreal 3D VR space. On the screens the player controls Skategirl, who just destroyed the universe. The player in VR must grab, move and fit together the TV screens like jigsaw pieces to create a path Skategirl can move through to escape the horrible, horrible consequences of her own actions. But like, in a fun way.

name: Skullbangers!
summary: Skullbangers is a lightning-paced party game where reaction speed and wit will win the day! Fly across stages to chase, avoid and trap your opponents!

name: Sky Roll!
summary: Tilt the floor, roll the ball, avoid obstacles, jump gaps, go faster! Attempt to complete all 120 levels and find all 360 red coins Looking for something addictive with hours of game play? Install 'Sky Roll!' today!

name: Sky Mercenaries Redux
summary: An epic sky battle awaits you! Sky Mercenaries is back with a overhauled 2020 Nintendo Switch exclusive Redux edition. Choose your pilot and fighter to join the ultimate 2D polarity S.H.M.U.P action ! Fight over 50 enemy types on 8 worlds in over 32 story missions and unlimited random content. Be prepared for the overpowering enemy fleet and challenging bossfights. Upgrade your fighters, drones and pilots the way you like to play them. Get powerful and permanent visible upgrades, armor and different types of weapons. Level up your pilots and assign skill points in 3 different skill trees to unlock a variety of abilities like auto-shield, critical buffs and more. Join the Mercenaries now!

name: Skittles
summary: Skittles is a game of skill in which the goal is to score exactly fifty points by knocking down pins numbered 1 through 12 with a throw of a wooden stick. This Skittle game can be played solo against the computer or in local multiplayer. The player throws a stick into the pins. The player's score depends on the number of pins knocked down: If he knocks down a pin, he scores the value of the pin; If he knocks down several pins, he scores the number of pins knocked down (if all the pins knock down, the player scores twelve points); If a pin is not completely down on the ground and is balanced on another pin or on the the throwing stick, it is not counted. Fallen pins are then raised on their feet, numbered facing the throwing area, right where they are and without lifting them off the ground. Thus the configuration of the playing area changes. Each player takes a turn at throwing and as many turns are taken as necessary. The winner is the one who scores exactly 50 points. If this mark is exceeded, the player or team score drops to 25. So as the 50 points are approached, the player must be careful to knock down only the pin(s) that will cause the player to reach the 50 points by value (if only one pin falls) or number (if more than one pin falls). For example, if his score is 48, the player must knock down any two pins…

name: SkyLife: VoxelSurvival
summary: An open world FPS game in voxel world. Use the items to go back and forth between the islands and aim to escape!

name: Skythrone
summary: SkyThrone is a vertical shooter in which you have to defend the Earth from invading space invaders. You are a sexy girl commander who, from childhood, learned to achieve her goal at any cost. This skill came in handy when entering the military and subsequent promotion.

name: Skinwalkers
summary: A Horror Adventure where YOU dictate the ending.

name: Skate Forever
summary: Skate Forever is a classic 2D runner with a side view. Test your reaction, make the skater jump in time. On the levels you can find special perks that change the gameplay, for example, speeding up the character, or you can take an anti-gravity skate, turn upside down.

name: Skautfold: Moonless Knight
summary: Skautfold: Moonless Knight is a very open-ended Metroidvania, featuring a totally unique battle system. Set in an alternate history Japan in 1900, Lovecraftian horrors have plagued the world, as our very Moon opens up and becomes our end.

name: Sketchy Fables
summary: Sketchy Fables is a first-person exploration adventure and can be described as a comic book that has broken up over a landscape. Sketchy Fables strives to stimulate Your own imagination trough its various open puzzles set in an open world filled with cities and mysterious places to explore.

name: Skyward Descent
summary: Use your jet to manoeuvre through and burn enemies. Discover powerful item synergies. Die repeatedly to tough bosses.

name: Skullcaps
summary: Skull Caps, the RTS video game sequel to Baldies, where the player takes command of creatures named skullies that are pitted against hairies. There are 45 levels. To proceed to the other level skullies have to destroy all hostile units and buildings.

name: Skydom
summary: Skydom is an open-world experience all about combat and adventure. Swords clash, arrows fly, and dragons roar.

name: Skydrift Infinity
summary: Skydrift Infinity is an action-packed arcade game focusing on the experience of flying alone, and with others, in a light, quick, fast-paced style.

name: Skyjunk
summary: Blast and slash your way across the sky in this action roguelite. Armed with your grappling hook and an array of ingenious weapons and gadgets, contend with a mechanized army in procedurally generated levels.

name: Skeleton Wave
summary: Your task is to protect your village from skeletons, survive as many waves as possible.

name: Skyratz
summary: Take to the air as one of six unique heroes and soar through Avion City as you perform tricky maneuvers, hunt for weapons and armor, and battle in the skies to claim your spot on the pecking order!

name: Skull Head World
summary: Defend Skull Head World. Shoot skulls at invading skulls. Collect skulls to protect your skull. Flush skulls to upgrade. Part single-stick bullet-hell shooter, part top-down physics brawler. Super addictive arcade fun.

name: Sky Goddess Ⅱ
summary: "Sky Goddess Ⅱ" is a vertical scrolling flying shooting game with nostalgic movie images.

name: Ski Run
summary: Ski Run is a downhill skiing game where player must avoid obstacles on the ski run with further distances earning higher scores. Don't hit trees, other people or animals while going down and make sure to jump over gaps.

name: Sky Seeker
summary: SkySeeker is a game that aims to drop the enemy at the target location. You can feel very exhilarating when you can blow away your enemies, so please play.

name: Skill at Time
summary: Skill at Time is a 2D shooter game where the player shoots down hordes of zombies using a flying skillet and his dexterity. Copters with bombs fly around, and the player needs to dodge the pans, which land and increase with each passing world.

name: Sky Journey: Jigsaw Landscapes
summary: Discover peace in a calm Jigsaw Journey about finding a lost friend, trhough gorgeus landscapes. What happens when you set the last piece?

name: Skippy the Bot
summary:
This game was made to celebrate AM2R's 5th anniversary, and it's based on a brief sequence where you remotely control a robot. In this puzzle physics platformer, you'll be challenged to complete 10 hand crafted levels. It's a short experience, that makes it very appealing to try speed running, or other challenges:

Can you complete the game while collecting all the gems?
Can you complete the game without collecting any gems at all?
How about a deathless run?

Have fun!

name: Skye: The Misty Isle
summary: A hyper-realistic survival game set on the isle of Skye during the Viking period. Washed ashore you will fight both the elements and the island's natural predators for survival in a bid to find out how you came to be upon its shores.

name: Skull Seeker
summary: Ready for an adventure? Explore a beautiful stylized world, solve interesting puzzles, avoid deadly traps and discover the secret of the mysterious skull.

name: Skeleton King
summary: Lose yourself in this relaxing, realistic runner while realizing it's really about a restless reliquary that's actually rather scary, due to the animated skeletons. It's an atmospheric, spooky, casual game that's perfect for Halloween fun!

name: Skip Lake
summary: “Solve beautiful puzzles and listen to the melody of crashing Pots!”

name: Skiiiiiiiiiiiiiiid
summary: Driiift your way through tons of obstacles and collect all the fuel.

name: Skyrim Special Edition + Fallout 4 G.O.T.Y Bundle
summary: Get the Bethesda Game Studios' post-nuclear and epic fantasy masterpieces with more than 250 Game of the Year Awards, Fallout 4 Game of the Year Edition and The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Special Edition, now bundled at a reduced price.

name: Skillsworn
summary: Skillsworn is a real time, party-based isometric adventure game. Take on the role of a fresh adventurer and embark on a journey through the wilds of the world. Defeat a variety of dangerous foes and prove that you are not just another bored peasant seeking a thrill.

name: Sky Warriors: Blazing Clouds
summary: Fly & fight with war jets! Join the Sky Warriors today and become an ace pilot! Experience the thrill of realistic aerial battles and engaging enemies in adrenaline-packed 3D dogfights!

name: Skeleton Troubles
summary: Skeleton troubles - This platformer will put on your shoulders an unusual task - resurrect your skeleton hero, collecting bones and hearts in the dungeon so that he regains his strength and teach all his enemies a lesson. Jump over the spikes, dodge the cunning slugs that will shoot at you and run to victory!

name: Skylanders SuperChargers: Dark Edition Starter Pack
summary:
This edition includes the following
1 Videogame
NEW Portal of Power
2 Skylanders SuperChargers - Dark Spitfire and Dark Super Shot Stealth Elf
2 Skylanders Vehicles - Dark Hot Streak and Dark Sea Shadow

2-Sided Dark Edition Collection Poster featuring the special artwork and a complete set of Skylanders Superchargers and their vehicles

name: Skullgirls: 2nd Encore - Annie
summary: Fiercer than she looks, bravest in the cosmos, she is ANNIE OF THE STARS! This DLC includes Annie, her new stage, 29 palettes, character tutorials/trials, and full Story Mode!

name: Skull Chainz
summary: Smash your way out of Hell in this unique physics-based combat game!

name: Ski Doom VR
summary: The classic ski survival game is back - and this time, in virtual reality. Pick your ride, hit the slopes, and outrun the mountain monster as long as possible. Compete for the #1 spot on the global leaderboards

name: Skyforge: Bounty Hunter Collector's Edition
summary: Let the hunt begin! This Collector’s Edition unlocks the Bounty Hunter, a powerful new AOE damage-dealing class armed to the teeth with explosive weapons, plus trick anti-grav and shield gadgets. You'll also receive an exclusive Costume, Legendary Weapon, and a host of useful items:

name: SkunkHunter 101
summary: 2020 port of the 2009 title. Grow and sell weed.

name: Skybinder
summary: Skybinder is a creative puzzle. Enjoy thinking spatially, playfully, and meditatively as you bind dots into shapes.

name: Sky Goddess Ⅱ: DLC-1
summary: Open a new fighter: Curtis

name: Sky Goddess Ⅱ: DLC-4
summary: Open a new fighter: Huppamalin

name: Sky Goddess Ⅱ: DLC-2
summary: Open a new fighter: De Havilland

name: Skeletoon: Forgotten Memories
summary: a 2D platform inspired to the legends of the gaming "golden age"

name: Sky Mirror: Strolling
summary: Relax and stroll in this dreamland, get positive energy and avoid negative energy.

name: Skotos
summary: Grab your Lantern and plunge into the darkness of Skotos, a terrifying first-person platforming game that will make you brave the darkness to survive.

name: Skattered Dream
summary: A Difficult Platformer, Skattered Dream is a tribute to the classic games of the 80's. It may look dated but this little game that still could can pack a serious punch. Its not easy to survive in this world but boy is it fun!

name: Skyfall
summary: Play an exciting 2D old-school RPG in the classic style of Valiant - Resurrection by the same developers.

name: Skirmish Line: Mad Jack
summary: The Great Emu War ended on an uneasy armistice. Now in democracy's darkest hours, the Emu Nation has allied itself with Imperial Japan, declaring open war with the people of the free world. Emu War 2 has begun, and only one man stands in their way, Mad Jack, veteran of the first Emu War.

name: Sky Goddess
summary: "Sky Goddess" is a vertical scrolling flying shooting game with nostalgic movie images.

name: Skateboard Party 2 Pro
summary: Skateboard Party 2 brings all the fun of skateboarding to your mobile device allowing you to ride in 8 completely unique locations. Jump on your board, learn new moves and improve your skateboarding skills to land sick combos. Play with your friends using the new online multiplayer mode or challenge skaters from all over the world using the online leaderboards. Complete achievements, gain experience and upgrade your favorite skater. You can also customize your outfits, boards, trucks and wheels with real brands.

name: Sky Dancer Run
summary: In Sky Dancer you will join the dangerous game called Sky Dancing and push yourself to limitation with every wild jumps through a stunningly beautiful planet! Sky Dancer is for people who love Skydriving and also for whom never experiencing the beautiful of risk while being airborne!

name: Skiing Race
summary:
Think you are up for this challenge?
The aim here is to finish the mission as fast as possible. See how quickly you can do it and perform some fantastic stunts on the way! There is no time limit with this game; you can ride at your own pace - but fast and furious is much more fun!

name: Skronchulonch: The Game of Shooting at an Orb
summary: An easier game in the Gravitar/Thrust genre

name: Skyrush
summary: Beautiful, speed focused, racing game

name: Skeletal Dos Dreams
summary: don't worry, your files are right where you left them

name: SkyOfSteel
summary: Multiplayer sandbox building game in the sky

name: Sky Chasers
summary: In Sky Chasers players explore a magical world in a cardboard box, starring Max. Fight against unique enemies and complete challenges to prove you are a true Sky Chaser!

name: Skywatching
summary:
There is something among the stars.
Keep looking up.

A very short horror game. Heavily inspired by LOCAL 58 TV.

name: Skynet Simulator
summary: You are Skynet

name: Skate Space
summary: Multiplayer skating game on mobile. Create your own skate park and have skate sessions with others, and participate in skate competitions. Level up your tricks and earn points while you skate.

name: Sky Tale
summary: Sky Tale is a cute city building game about creating lovely islands using various tiles and buildings. Sky Tale provides you challenging and yet relaxing experience. You can try to set new highscore by carefully planning all your moves and building up strong economy or you can simply explore colorful biomes and build settlements, villages or even towns.

name: Skullz
summary: A Surreal Choose'n'Pick Adventure.

name: Skullfracture
summary: Skullfracture is a tridimensional fighting game inspired by Smash Bros where you kick, punch and throw your way to victory by launching the opponent out of the ring!

name: Sky Serpents
summary: Sky Serpents is an action-platform game released on October 22, 2010. The player becomes a Slayer that wants to beat his father's record at slaying giant beasts called sky serpents.

name: SkateRPG
summary: SkateRPG is a skateboarding role-playing game where you explore the city of Ollielá learning skateboarding tricks, playing skateboarding minigames, taking a skateboard ride, and talking to the townspeople.

name: SkateRide
summary: 2D Isometric Skateboarding Sim

name: Sky Farm
summary: A game about building and optimizing floating farms.

name: Skautfold: Knight's End
summary: Skautfold: Knight's End is the final chapter in the Skautfold series. Explore the Waltham Industries factory and uncover its dark secrets; with a unique timeline-based RPG battle system, you'll come face-to-face with Eldritch horrors as humanity reaches its final days on Earth...

name: Skulldude
summary: A Top-down dungeon crawler bullet-hell shmup.

name: Skull Golf: Creation in Decay
summary: A putt game about death. You putt a little skull around on small courses, creating symbols with your trail. Diversifiers for the jam: One to avoid - Make a game in a genre you do not like. Extra points if you can add a twist that makes it enjoyable to you. Bi Shade - You may only use two colours.

name: Skullhammer
summary: Help a skeleton find his way through the haunted dungeons

name: Sker Ritual
summary: The co-op survival FPS and spiritual successor to the award-winning occult horror, Maid of Sker. Play solo or up to 4 players to survive the supernatural onslaught of the Quiet Ones.

name: Skate Hooligans
summary: Cowabunga! Little hooligans are on the way!

name: Sky on Fire: 1940
summary: Battle of britain/france simulator

name: Skele Magic
summary: move platforms with magic!

name: Skelemania
summary: Explore the colorful underground as an agile skeleton!

name: Skyblazor
summary: Launch yourself to your nostalgic home. (GGJ19)

name: Sky Glove
summary: Defend the sky with your rocket glove!

name: Skyrogue
summary: Tactical thievery roguelike

name: Sketch of a job that you had
summary: an electric zine about that time you had to serve coffee to people five years younger & much more stable than you

name: Skyward Heroes
summary: Hack-n-Slash Dungeon Crawler with Character-classes.

name: Skill Drop
summary: Abilities become boxes in this cute puzzle-platformer!

name: Skate Samurai
summary: A fight game about an Archer and a Samurai

name: Skeal
summary: A short skiing game that features Seal, pleasure, and pain.

name: Skate or Don't!
summary: Skate or Don't! is a massively multiplayer online arcade game.

name: Ski Air Mix
summary:
Ski Air Mix is a ski game that features 4 different characters (that can be customized) and skis. In the game the goal is to be the fastest in reach the goal. The game features 3D graphics and different circuits and even a vs mode against the computer or another player.

Master the wildest international ski slopes with the help of 4 player characters and 11 different pairs of skis. Alpen or Versus Modes allow you to challenge the computer or a friend as you race towards the bottom of the 5 slopes. Perform wild stunts and speed compete simultaneously in this great futuristic board game.

name: Sketchy Racing
summary: Time trial racing on notepaper. 25 levels to race on, plus an editor to create more. Wide open rally stages, tight street circuits, technical hairpins and fast sweepers.

name: Skeletal Skism
summary: War has broken out between the undead... All for one sole purpose: to determine the One - True - Skeleton - King. Do you have what it takes to claim the crown?

name: Sky Games
summary: Put on your gloves, stun your opponents, collect your balloons and fly for the win by leaving your opponents behind!

name: Ski Jump International v3
summary: Good old SJ3 by Ville Könönen.

name: Sky Races
summary: Your focus is to compete with other airplanes as quickly as possible and push them to the next level. The game is very immersive, engaging, and fun, and you will find yourself playing, again and again, all the time. If you want to test your prowess against your friends, this is the right way to do it. Check out Sky Races right now and immerse yourself in the most exciting airplane race game ever!

name: Skul: The Hero Slayer - Deluxe Edition
Skazka
summary: A tale of goodness, heroism, love for one's neighbor and self-sacrifice. Embark on a dangerous adventure, fight demons and solve riddles to find the magic flower and heal the dying mother ...

name: Skeleton Jumper
summary:
Bored? With insomnia? This game is your best option for fun!
This is a fun and challenging casual game!
Will you be able to reach the last level?

name: Skelton Zone Traveler Emergence
summary: Help the travelers escape the horrors of the Skelton Zone.

name: Skull Bullets
summary: Skull Bullets is a roguelike game with RPG elements. You are a risen from the dead shooter who is trying to get out of the endless forest with the undead. Upgrade your skills, get new weapons and deal with a whole crowd of enemies. Will you be able to get out? It all depends on you.

name: Sky Harrier: Alpha Code
summary: Single player on rails shooter featuring aerial combat, nostalgic nods to classic arcade shmups, synthwave inspired aesthetics and a vibe to take you straight to the 1980s.

name: Sketch Crawler
summary: Sketch Crawler is a super-creative deck-building roguelike single player RPG game about the King of Cartoons who lost his kingdom in a wicked magic picture.

name: Sky Caravan
summary: Welcome to the Skyways, caravaneer. Complete missions, manage your ship’s resources and make tough decisions to keep your crew alive and happy. Or not. Choices have lasting consequences in this Text-Based RPG. You are the captain - and the clouds are waiting!

name: Skew Pong
summary: Skew Pong is a unique fast-paced take on a classic. Make use of inertia and gravity to win. Push the area around and bend the floor to influence the ball's trajectory. Battle against your friends or AI's and see if you can skew with it.

name: Skeeter's Grid
summary: Re-connect mixed-up circuits in this 80s-inspired isometric puzzler as you move from board to board, each of increasing complexity and variation. Collect components, remnants of former grid guardians, as you rebuild each system, with the chance of additional components spawning during replays.

name: Sky DarkCrow
summary: Crow has to defeat enemies and collect coins and others.

name: Skycliffs
summary: Skycliffs is an action shooter roguelike dungeon crawler with fast-paced top-down platforming. Jump and dash across sky islands, fight loads of monsters, and get upgrades to survive the many dangers of your journey. Will you be strong enough to reach and defeat the keeper of this floating world?

name: SkyJumper
summary: SkyJumper - Side Scroller with Runner elements. A game in which the player parries with a flying parachutist and dodges obstacles and sharp blades that fold on the move, which line up randomly and each time complicate the race.

name: Skater Boy
summary: Skater Boy is a side-scrolling obstacle course with automatic scrolling. The game is divided into several scenes with 30 levels in each scene. The goal of each level is to simply reach the end of the course, however achievements are awarded for flawless skating, amassing a large number of points and getting all gold goblets. The skater boy is controlled by two on-screen buttons: the left one is used to accelerate, the right one to jump.

name: Skull-Scraper
summary: Skull-Scraper is a choice based text adventure game about scraping skulls, made for the Tiny Utopias Jam.

name: Skimming Canoe
summary: Skimming canoe is a fast-paced action game where your reaction time is key. The aim of the game is to survive as long as you can without getting hit buy the rocks to get the highest score possible. You can collect coins along the way which can be used in the shop to buy even more cool canoes. We have many game modes such as original, arena mode, ranked and even an online multiplayer mode!

name: SkyRider
summary: SkyRider is a 2 player co-op action puzzle platformer game. One player will control Noki, jumping, fighting and collecting energy for his drone. The other one will control that drone: "R.O.B.O.T.O", making platforms, energy shields and shooting.

name: Skeleton Scramble Deluxe
summary: Skeleton Scramble Deluxe is a fast-paced, head-to-head real-time strategy game. Play as a necromancer, summon an army of relentless skeleton warriors, and frantically build a gauntlet of turrets to hold off your opponent's forces.

name: Skiing VR
summary: Ski anytime you want on perfectly designed slopes in VR. Find your way to the finish line in this arcade ski simulator and prove that you're the best skier! Enjoy different game modes alone or with your friends

name: Skullborn
summary: Skullborn is an infinite massively multiplayer sandbox game! Begin as a skeleton, fight, gather resources, and craft armor/weapon to upgrade your bones! Explore and team up with other players around the world.

name: Skyward
summary: Build against the oncoming storm in an island hopping, rune collecting, roguelite citybuilder!

name: Sky Jump
summary: A journey to find something hidden in the sky on a small light aircraft. Wear VR and stand in place and enjoy adventures. There's no radical movement, and I try to play while savoring what I see.

name: Ski Bunny
summary: Hit the slopes with Ski Bunny! Practice on the intermediate trails, then step up to the Double Diamonds!

name: Sky Gamblers: Air Supremacy 2
summary: An extensive single player campaign and delightful multiplayer modes, the non-stop action will keep you at the edge of your seat! Sky Gamblers: Air Supremacy 2 is a dogfight simulator taking its roots from the original classic hit. Rich combat mechanics and a spot-on balance between simulation and arcade make it accessible to all player types and allows for a personalized experience with varied control schemes and play styles.

name: Skullnight
summary: Skeletons, dolphins and neon - that's what awaits you in the 2D indie arcade Skullnight! You will find a lot of puzzles and mini-games that will test the strength of your and your abilities!

name: Skedaddle Out the Dungeon
summary: Skedaddle Out the Dungeon is an indie developed Rogue-like. Fight your way through randomly generated dungeons against the many monsters that inhabit it. Collect unique items, coins, and bombs to help obliterate anything that stands in your way!

name: Skate Lines
summary: Skate Lines allows you to record your favorite tricks and lines and share them to Facebook, Twitter, Youtube and Everyplay. In turn, you get to discover and copy lines that other players have created – giving you access to an endless feed of new ideas to explore.

name: Sketch, Share, Solve
summary: Sketch, Share, Solve is a nonogram game for Playdate, fitting loads of puzzles onto the tiny screen. Play on your own or create puzzles with your friends.

name: Skelerun
summary: Skelerun is a randomly generated platformer where you race against the clock to escape a dungeon littered with all manner of tricks, traps, and hazards before the way out slams closed.

name: Skellies Ain't Scary
summary: Skellies Ain't Scary is a bullet hell rogue-like with minimalist graphics. Delve into dungeons, collect guns and items. Build the strongest synergies and beat all the bosses. Uncover the secrets of the dungeon and collect the lost treasures that await you.

name: Skyscraper Jump
summary: Help the little cube fulfill his dream and jump to the Limit.

name: Sketch
summary: Enter the Land of Cere as a mysterious being, Am. Traverse through the mind of Taylor, an artist whose passion for art is dimming. Am wields a pencil, which can draw shapes to progress through levels and erase enemies to clear Taylor's mind and ultimately restore Taylor's passion.

name: Skyriders
summary:
Inspired by classic games of the past, Skyriders is a fast-paced mix of platformer and racing game. Pilot a small spacecraft along crazy tracks in space, dodging and jumping obstacles, whilst trying to maintain a high speed by collecting the glowing stars and hitting the boost pads!
Keep the boost streak going for massive scores and flawless runs - but you'll need some well-timed switching between red and yellow to grab the matching stars!
Can you master the increasingly challenging stages, get the gold medal scores, and climb those leaderboards?

name: Skull Maze: Tiny Roguelike
summary: Skull Maze was a very simple roguelike where you have to run through levels collecting coins while avoiding enemies

name: Skyraid
summary: Squad up with your friends in this 6 vs 6 game of aerial conquest! Pilot cute parodies of iconic war planes ranging from early props to modern multirole jets. Become the top dog leveraging a huge array of equipment to tip the scales in your favor and rule the skies!

name: Skotos: Levels Pack
summary: With the levels pack for Skotos, you can unlock 9 new levels, new variants of the puppetmaster clown, and new platforms to traverse across.

name: Skylost
summary: Skylost is a 3D exploration and crafting game where you climb and glide your way through dangerous floating islands in search of your lost love Amelia.

name: Ski Play by Samplay
summary: Ski Play is the first tile scrolling arcade ski game made with Pulp for playdate

name: Skuiggle
summary: Skuiggle is a small game about creating abstract paintings via a combination of strange controls and the collection of colourful boxes.

name: Skeletons vs Nadia
summary: Skeletons vs Nadia is a third person game with beautiful graphics! In this game you have to play as a naked girl Nadya, who needs to get out of the cursed forest. There are a lot of lustful skeletons in this forest who want to kill you!

name: Skies of Blue: Remake
summary: Skies Of Blue Remake is a First Person Puzzle Platformer in that you go from level to level. Collect all Collectables, complete all levels and build your own in the custom level editor!

name: Skye Tales
summary: A gentle puzzle-exploration game set in a world that couldn’t be happier to see you.

name: SkyFactory 4
summary:
Back again for more modded skyblock fun! SkyFactory 4 offers a brand-new experience never before seen in the series. Full automation, tech, magic, and bacon resources! This iteration offers over 30+ world types so you can play the pack like never before! While some world types are based on the classic tree on dirt others are designed with unique recipes and advancements.

What makes this version different from every other SkyFactory before it? We've completely redesigned the resource gathering. Sieving for resources are a thing of the past. For a more immersive experience, Sky Orchards has been introduced. Resource Trees provides a built-in progression system and lets the player choose the resources they want to produce rather than a randomized system. We've removed the achievement book and replaced it with the advancement system. Instead of requiring players to manually check out what they've accomplished, the game will keep track for you. This system isn't designed to create a required questing system, but rather an optional set of goals for players looking for ideas on what to do next.

SkyFactory 4 introduces the prestige system! This is a completely optional game mode allowing you to unlock mods, items, and mechanics through an open progression system. Prestige points and unlocks are global and can be brought with you to other worlds! Prestige points can be gained by finishing advancements or by using the Parabox, a time-traveling box that generates points. To get started, enable prestige mode on the world creation screen.

name: Sky in your eyes
summary: Visual novel about the life in the post-soviet country. Cute artstyle, 10 animated CGs, 5 BGs and 5 chibi CGs in 4k, English voice-over for each heroine, animated live2d sprites, original OSTs and a dramatic story!

name: Skip Lake 2
summary: “Solve beautiful puzzles and listen to the melody of crashing Pots going deeper into the story of Skip Lake!”

name: Skull and Bones: Limited Edition
summary: Enter the Golden Age of Piracy as you sail through rich merchant trade routes. Embody an insatiable pirate captain, dive into the battle for the ruling of the Indian Ocean and become the most feared pirate, alone or with your gang of up to 5 players.

name: Skeletons
summary: Regurgitated back into a cursed and dying world, you must fight and explore to ascend the tower. But be warned, time and life isn't on your side.

name: Skull and Bones: Premium Edition
summary:
Skull and Bones Premium Edition includes:
- Base game
- Up to 3 days early access.
- The Ballad of Bloody Bones Collection
- 2 extra missions: The Ashen Corsair & Bloody Bones Legacy.
- Digital Artbook of 84 pages and digital selected game soundtrack.
- Smuggler Pass token (Unlocks a premium battle pass and additional content. Usable when new seasons release.)

name: Skeleton King
summary: A role-playing nonlinear game. 1. Tomb robbing: obtain bones. 2. Summon: resurrect bones. 3. Battle: PK between players' skeletons. 4. Market: free trading skeleton. 5. Occupy: occupy the altar of soul power, absorb soul power alone, and upgrade bones.

name: Skate Shop Simulator
summary: Build, run & create your own Skate Shops. Renovate, upgrade and expand your services and create your own shopping empire! Skate Shop Simulator allows you to create and run your own skate shop network.

name: Sky Mammoths
summary: Sky Mammoths takes place in a dystopian future where your only chance for survival is to raid freighters that carry essential resources controlled by monopolies. Save yourself and others by hunting 'Sky Mammoths' and redistributing the stolen resources.

name: Skwish
summary: Tidy blocks and solve brainteasers in this satisfying puzzle game!

name: Skystrike: Wings of Justice
summary: Use your falcon powers to soar, smash and stealth your way to victory against the RatKing’s army in this hometown hero adventure!

name: Sky Captain's Return
summary: Inspired by the classics "Future Cop L.A.P.D" and "Herzog Zwei" in Sky Captain's Return, you play as a strong mecha warrior to conquer the enemy base with your units. Defeat the legendary Sky Captain in single-player mode or compete against your friends or random players.

name: Sky Gamblers: Rise of Glory
summary:
Earn your wings as a World War I Flying Ace in Sky Gamblers: Rise of Glory! Immerse yourself in WWI combat and the dawn of aerial warfare as you pilot revolutionary flying machines. Take-off solo in mission-based Campaign Mode, or take to the skies online with up to 8 players in real-time multiplayer. Put your flying skills to the ultimate test against players from all over the world!
Choose from a long list of realistic WWI planes and perform dizzying acrobatic maneuvers with an intuitive combination of touch-screen and accelerometer controls. Engage in fierce air-to-air and air-to-ground combat in your pursuit for glory.

name: Skate Rift
summary: An immersive first person skateboarding simulator set on an island, interconnected by many courses and rifts.

name: Skinny & Franko: Fists of Violence
summary: Brutal next chapter of Amiga's legendary beat'em'up 'Franko: The Crazy Revenge' is here. It's time to clean the streets of shit. The iconic game finally gets a sequel it deserves.

name: Skeleton Attack: Nightmare Awaken
summary: Fight against different types of creatures using magic, agility, strategy and strength in a third-person action game.

name: Skaramazuzu
summary: Enter the mysterious world of Skaramazuzu, and get ready to be tested. Meet strange beings and whimsical personalities, face challenges, and solve riddles in a hand-drawn, black and white 2D world.

name: Skator Gator 3D
summary: Stop the mayor from polluting the swamp in this short, 3D adventure! Explore new open locales with skateboard in hand or while grinding on pipelines - Greenjamin's skating into the third dimension in Skator Gator 3D!

name: Skylark
summary: In this action-adventure game, you are an ex-mafia member who seeks revenge for the death of your best friend. Receive upgrades when defeating mafia bosses. Throughout the game, you can upgrade your powers and decide to either take over the city or free it from anyone of high power.

name: Skala
summary: Skala is a puzzle game about changing the scale of the world.

name: Skeleton Punchers
summary: Explosive 2D Pixel Art Action! Help the Skeleton Punchers defeat the Zerpian army of the night and recover the Patrician's Hoard before it's too late!

name: Skin
summary: SKIN is an otherworldly stealth game where you hunt monsters in a nightmare forest. You are Artemis, and you will summon an Eternal Night.

name: Sky Puzzle
summary: Sky Puzzle is a real-time turn-based card strategy game. You will meet all kinds of women, and through the test of courage and wisdom, you will further draw closer to each other. Of course, they are not ordinary girls.

name: Sky Combat
summary:
Sky Combat — air force game with epic PvP dogfight.
Fly modern jet planes, destroy dangerous enemies and get the adrenaline rush you crave!! Immerse yourself in this war plane game and become the flying ace!

name: Skyforge: Firestarter Collector's Edition
summary: Ready to set Aelion ablaze? This Collector's Edition unlocks the Firestarter, the latest powerful class to join Skyforge! This dark trickster is a master of fire magic, and uses fireballs, meteors, and blazing breath to torch enemies.

name: Skid
summary: Skid VR is an Open World Bike simulator and Racing game inspired by Road Rash and NFS.

name: Skirmishers
summary: Rally your warriors to fight alongside you, rescue your friends, bolster your troops and fight for supremacy.

name: Sky Traveler
summary: Simulator of life in the Japanese village. Building your own village. Use the portal to move around the islands and collect resources. Once you're ready - go to other worlds. There is work for you too. Relax and feel like a hero in this world.

name: Skirmish Mayhem
summary: Skirmish Mayhem is an action strategy game where you equip and upgrade an arsenal of weapons, construct a base of defenses and build an army to defend against waves of enemies. 3 factions are waging war, fight for your faction, unlock powerful heroes, tech up and become an all-powerful force.

name: Skull Survivor
summary: Swing your nimble weapon at hordes of enemies! Collect the souls of your fallen enemies and reinforce your skull. Exterminate thousands of Vampires, Zombies, and Demons. Choose the best build and compound your abilities to deal the most damage possible to the onslaught.

name: Skader
summary: A sci-fi MOBA with unique ice-skating locomotion and a trail generator device to catch your enemies. Use power-ups to gain an advantage, coordinate with the team, and fight for your universe in a final multiverse battle for the ancient rune to save your world.

name: Skellington
summary: A 3D-Platformer collectathon! Run, jump, crawl, bounce and stomp your way through halloween themed levels!

name: Sky Tomb
summary: Have you ever looked at a boss and felt "Damn, I wish I - the player - was that powerful." Look no further than the retro-styled dopamine-fueled time-deleting powertrip of Sky Tomb!

name: Skater XL: Tampa Pro 2022 Gear Pack For Charity
summary: Skatepark Of Tampa Pro 2022 Gear Collection pack includes 5 new gear items, featuring the official artwork of the world’s longest running skateboard contest. All proceeds will be donated to Boards For Bros, a non-profit organization that refurbishes used skateboards for underprivileged youth.

name: Skyscraper
summary: 'Skyscraper' is a battle royale shooter game that tells the story of hikers who participated in the Super Bullet Grand Prix. Play a variety of unique Hikers, play a variety of gameplay using battle gears, and freely roam around the city through zipline and parkour to win the Super Bullet Grand Prix!

name: Sky Base Venus
summary: Sky Base Venus is a colony simulator set in the upper atmosphere of Venus. Harvest resources from Venus and its atmosphere, build up your colony, grapple with disasters and system failures, and pursue self-sufficiency as your support from Earth dwindles.

name: Ski3
summary: The unending, relaxing and somewhat harrowing experience of the classic 90's game in this 3D take on the old adventure.

name: Sky Haven Tycoon
summary: Become the most prominent airport tycoon and create home and route connections for both planes and passengers. Create your very own Skyhaven airport sandbox.

name: Skelethrone: The Chronicles of Ericona
summary: Skelethrone is a challenging 2D action platformer with RPG elements inspired by games like Castlevania, Blasphemous and Dark Souls.

name: Skydance's Behemoth
summary: Skydance’s Behemoth is an original story set in the Forsaken Lands, a fallen kingdom haunted by tragedy. Play as an outland warrior, Wren the Hunter, and embark on a perilous quest to end the curse that plagues yourself and your village. Your only hope is to slay the unslayable, the monstrous Behemoths.

name: Skelter+Heaven
summary: Skelter Heaven is a rhythm game/visual novel following a group of mecha pilots in the year 2030.

name: Skwampt
summary: Skwampt is a Yume Nikki-like game about exploring the memories of an alien flying through space. Made for Dream Diary Jam 6.

name: Skull Kid
summary: Skull Kid is a side scrolling action game. Playing as a skeleton with a chainsaw, it needs to destroy objects in some office and kill people. In the second level, it has to take cover and shoot other armed people. In the last, third level, it is once again armed with a chainsaw and the task is to kill the boss.

name: Skincrawlers
summary: A tiny game made for the Haunted Hunting Jam

name: Skullgirls: 2nd Encore - Umbrella
summary: The saltiest sibling in the Canopy Kingdom (and her insatiable monstrosity Hungern) have at long last joined the Skullgirls roster!

name: Skeletons and Skulls
summary: Skeletons and Skulls is a game about a necromancer who summons skeletons to help himself.

name: Ski Challenge
summary:
Feel the excitement and thrill of ski racing on your mobile devices whenever and wherever you are with Ski Challenge 365 days a year!
Race down popular, real-world-inspired and fictional ski tracks against the timer or compete against your friends. Only the fastest win!

name: Skew
summary: A spin-off based on The Last Worker, Skew is a realtime 3D endless spinner starring the robot voiced by Jason Isaacs.

name: Skyfighter Arcade
summary: SkyFighter Arcade harkens back to the classic top-down shoot-em-up vertical scrollers, with modern day rogue-like twists. Test your reaction and maneuvering skills by blasting enemies out of the sky. Upgrade your Skyfighter and customize your loadout with upgradeable weapons and combo attacks.

name: SkyDive Racer
summary:
Race through the sky as you glide and parachute from plane to ship. Pick up coins throughout different routes while avoiding drones, birds and other obstacles. Collect mystery boxes along the way to gain special abilities. Upgrade your player to improve your chance to be the best skydive racer.
Can you finish first? No matter what happens, dance with your friends at the end of each landing. Have fun!

name: Sky Burger
summary: Catch the falling ingredients to build delicious burgers and earn money. Stack your burger into the sky: the better your burger, the bigger your tip! Unlock new burger recipes, new ingredients and new items to dress up your character and customize your food truck. What are you waiting for? Start building your burger now!

name: Skyemont Battle
summary: Battle your way through hordes of enemies, find treasure, and explore cool maps! Skyemont Battle is a simple hack and slash designed to be fun an easy to pick up with a survival style twist.

name: Sky Rider
summary: Skyrider is a fun and relaxing endless runner. Attempt a highscore, challenges, or simply enjoy the atmosphere of an endless futuristic city. Complete challenges to earn credits, which can be spent on character cosmetics.

name: Skelethrone: The Prey
summary: This game is a challenging 2D action platformer with RPG elements inspired by games like Castlevania and Dark Souls. Skelethrone: The Prey is a free prequel to the main game, setting the stage for the events that will unfold throughout Skelethrone: The Chronicles of Ericona campaign.

name: Skeleskeleskelter
summary: A demon girl? (Are those horns a fashion accessory?)… a girl, has lost her jacket. Please help her find it. Well, actually you're more of a third party. We can't tell if you're in the game and they just ignore you for the duration of it or if you don't exist in it.

name: Sky Goddess Remaking
summary: "Sky Goddess Remaking" is a vertical scrolling flying shooting game with nostalgic movie images. In the game, players will control different aircraft to fight in the air.

name: Sketch Rider
summary: Choose your car and wheels then race over 21 levels as fast as possible...

name: Sker Ritual: Goon Brenn
summary: Haunt Sker Island with the infamous phantom black cat, Goon Brenn and become the beast of Sker Island, featuring a new mask alongside a Premium menu background and more!

name: Sky High Games Horror Collection
summary: This is The Sky High Games Horror Collection. With this collection you will have 5 survival horror games to choose from. That can be played in any order.

name: Sker Ritual: The Quiet Ones
summary: Do not panic…don't even breathe! The Quiet Ones are back for a brand new DLC for Sker Ritual including a new mask and Premium menu background and more!

name: Sky Haven: AR Merge Adventure
summary: Uncover a worldwide mystery as a member of H.A.V.E.N., the agency whose mission is to research and protect the newly-discovered creatures living in our skies. Equip yourself with the agency’s latest gadgets and team up with local Guardians in your city to explore these majestic beings. With the help of your AR-enabled device and agency-issued drone, your mission is to heal, nourish, research, and communicate with an entirely new species. But be careful who you trust, because not everyone has the same altruistic agenda. Even other members of the agency could be plotting in secret.

name: Skeletery
summary: As a skeleton, build your cemetery and defend it against human raids!

name: Skybox
summary: What could be easier than jumping on a skateboard and driving in a straight line to the finish line? It is so? :)

name: Skera VR
summary: Skera is a single-player puzzle-solving action adventure VR game. Imprisoned within a colossal Tower, you must work with and against the resident AI. Sword in hand, carve your way through puzzles, obstacles and enemies in order to reactivate the mysterious tower and return home.

name: Skye Learning Watch
summary: Take your favourite Paw Patrol pup with you on the go with this interactive watch. Flip the cover to reveal 12 clock faces, a timer, stopwatch and alarm. It also comes with four exciting games that teach matching, animals, addition, subtraction and problem solving, plus cool sound effects and popular phrases from the show.

name: Skid the Scrambling Squirrel
summary: Collect the acorns, but beware of birds and other hazards.

name: SkyIsland
summary: "SkyIsland" is made by a group of students in a college, quarter-view action-adventure game. Enjoy the wonderful world and beautiful environments as you help the protagonist, Pino, fix his broken plane and defeat monsters to return home safely.

name: Sky Piper
summary:
Race through a wide variety of arcade style obstacles, spanning across 50 levels!
Steer your jets through increasingly difficult tunnels, pipes and caves. Win at higher levels to receive higher rewards!

name: Sky Oceans: Wings for Hire
summary: Sky Oceans: Wings For Hire is a homage to JRPG classics like Skies of Arcadia. Set in the open skies, experience adrenaline-filled turn-based dogfights as you take the role of captain and unite a party of rag-tag sky pirates setting upon an unforgettable, touching journey.

name: Ski Jump 18
summary: Ski jump is a retro ski jumping game with 55 different ski jumping hills from K50 to K250.

name: Skate Boy
summary: Unlicensed game released only in Spain.

name: Sky Kid
summary: Game Boy port of Sky Kid.

name: Sky Diver
summary: Atari 2600 port of Sky Diver.

name: Ski Resort Driver
summary: Welcome to the Ski Resort Driver! Start your vacation today and drive a huge roster of ‘Winter Vehicles’ around the cute snow covered ski village!

name: Skate Horse
summary: This Equestrian Rage Platformer stars a viral skateboarding horse who dies suddenly, and must grind, ollie and flip their way out of the hell out of PFFH (Purgatory For Famous Horses). Will you suffer a fate of damnation, or do you say neigh to death?

name: Sky Strikers VR
summary: Sky Strikers merges sports excitement with immersive VR. Anticipate ball flight, boost with your rocket, and strike for the ultimate "moment" in sports gaming. Experience it for yourself!

name: Sky Survivors
summary: Sky Survivors is an arena shooter roguelite. Choose from a variety of upgrades, unlock unique characters and weapons. Build «stairway to heaven» — a sky tower, each floor of which gives your character a unique bonus. Create your own overpowered build to survive against hordes of monsters!

name: Sky Bouncer
summary:
This is Sky Bouncer, collect all the coins to beat your friends in this endless battle to the sky. Use power ups and invincibility to go as high as you can.
Tap left and right on the screen of your device to guide your character through the waves of explosives and killer enemies, and test your reaction speed. See if you can top the leaderboards with the most coins.

name: Skip
summary: Skip, hop, jump!

name: Sker Ritual: Siren's Song
summary: Captured and imprisoned on Sker Island years before, the Siren's Song can be heard for miles, entrancing all who listens, featuring a new mask alongside a Premium menu background and more!

name: Sker Ritual: Stranger Danger
summary: Plague Sker Island and hypnotise all its residents with The Stranger, featuring a new mask alongside a Premium menu background and more!

name: Sky Driver
summary: Afraid of heights? Don't look down. A quick game of tightrope driving along a wavy, narrow road, on a car that goes faster and faster. Steer left and right to stay on the track and don't fall down. If you think you got the nerve, think twice!

name: Skater Escape
summary:
You need to escape quickly!!! A lot of cops are chasing you for using the streets to make stunts on your skateboard.
Tilt the skateboard by taping in the circles with the arrows, and don't forget... make a lot of stunts for getting speed and lose all the cops.

name: Skullpogo
summary:
The hordes of Undead are invading!

Zombies, bloodthirsty bats, and... vampire PIGS? It's time to deal with these vile cretins using your secret weapon: a POGO stick!

name: Sky Symphony
summary: Welcome to Sky Symphony, the ultimate side-scrolling flying adventure! Take flight in a stunning, immersive world filled with endless obstacles, challenges, and opportunities to collect points.

name: Skullgirls: 2nd Encore - Black Dahlia
summary: Carve your way through the Skullgirls cast with your gun-arm, hidden sawblades, and vicious taunts.

name: Skolios
summary: Cora wakes up in the main hall of an abandoned train station. She has no memory of what happened before she woke up, and an ominous silence surrounds the area. It's foggy outside the windows, the doors are locked and something disastrous seems to overtake the building... There are others, lost and confused, like Cora. And there are also the shadows and deformed creatures lurking and crawling in the dark, waiting to draw them into the deep. Will she be able to find a way out?

name: Ski Zoo
summary: Ski Zoo is an endless arcade skiing game!

name: Skedaddling In Egypt
summary: Skedaddling In Egypt is a first person speedrunning game where you use your parkour skills and mummy wrappings to swing and slide your way through your crumbling tomb. Compete with others through an online leaderboard, collect treasures, and more!

name: Skies Above the Great War
summary: Skies Above the Great War is a hybrid of action and grand strategy sandbox game set on the Western Front during the First World War. Manage your air forces or take control of any plane yourself in real time.

name: Sky
summary: Sky is a new way of looking at urban planning strategies. Change voxel landscapes at your discretion, develop technologies, build environmentally friendly cities of the future, and withstand any blows from the elements.

name: Skeleton Scale
summary: In this game the player must achieve the exact weight on both plates.

name: SkyVerse
summary: SkyVerse is a sandbox set in a procedurally generated world of floating islands. As a captain, you can expand your base, improve your engines, decorate it, and explore the world to discover new items and fight the evil within dungeons. The higher you go, the more challenging the game becomes!

name: Skinner & The Superintendent
summary: Help Skinner to do an unforgettable luncheon for Chalmers, with 9 possible endings!

name: Sky Division
summary: Lost on a desert island with a wounded enemy pilot and no resources, can you cooperate even though you are enemies? or will you kill each other? Sky division is a visual novel that deals with themes such as the meaninglessness of war and unrequited love.

name: Skiing Frenzy
summary: It's skiing day! Skiing Frenzy is a 2D top-down, retro-style ski game where you can play Slalom and Free Ski modes, each one giving you different challenges and lots of fun.

name: Sky Dreamer
summary:
Sky Dreamer is a game in the Nature Clan series, developed by Nice Code. It also has a VT03 variant, with entirely different music and graphics, but the main goal is the same.
Sky Dreamer runs on a similar engine to Dragon Co.'s games, and the background music is a rendition of the Pitfall II theme.

name: Sketch Doom
summary: A mod which turns a classic Doom game into a pencil sketches on paper list.

name: Skeleton Hotel
summary: Skeleton Hotel is a single player survival board game inspired by the Resident Evil and Silent Hill series, with an emphasis on inventory management and replayability. Featuring 1 compact story mode, more than 20 crazy characters, 6 killer transformations, obtainable S rank, and tons of unlockables.

name: Skyline Blade
summary: Amongst miles of cacti, sand, and bones lies the Skyline pilot training facility. Rumors persist about what goes on behind closed doors at the carefully guarded facility but all the world really knows is that Skyline generates the best pilots period. Do you have what it takes?

name: Skyland
summary:
A simple strategy game, where you build flying castles and fight other players. Runs on a Gameboy Advance. Instructions included within the game!

Supported peripherals:

* Gameboy Player (Gamecube) rumble support

* Link cable multiplayer

* SRAM or Flash storage

name: Sketch Heads
summary:
In Sketch Heads, players sketch pictures of a word prompt to get others to guess the prompt correctly.

Sketch Heads has two game modes: Classic and Blitz. Classic mode is a competitive battle against your friends where you take turns choosing a secret word to draw while everyone else competes to guess it as fast as possible! Blitz mode is a chaotic, cooperative race against the clock where you split into two teams, Drawers and Guessers. Drawers share a canvas and rapidly draw words while the Guessers guess as many as possible before the time runs out.

name: Skyhood's Innocent Six
summary: This game has three scenarios and three raising modes. It's a deckbuilding adventure game.

name: Skoory Rush
summary: The most absurdly amusing arcade game to hit your screens! Can you keep up with the chaos and out-score your friends? Find out as you climb the online leaderboards and become the ultimate Skoory Rush Master!

name: Skautfold: Usurper
summary: With Eldritch horrors having been unleashed by the outer-worldly Citadel, your job is to rid London of its terrors and defeat the Navigator!

name: Skate Jam
summary:
Do you think you have what it takes to be a pro skater? Have you attempted to land new combo tricks and tough grinds? What about warming up for skate competitions? Look no further.

Skate Jam is the ultimate professional skateboarding game designed to master your wildest skate tricks!

Explore different skate parks, unlock new boards and compete in global Skate Jam tournaments to become a skate legend.

name: Skystrider
summary: Embark on an epic journey in "Skystrider," a 3D action platformer. As a resurrected hero, explore a ruined world, navigating perilous paths amidst clouds and tides. Unleash ancient technology, unravel secrets, and shape your destiny in this captivating adventure.

name: Sky Runners Infinite: Parkour
summary: "Sky Runners Infinite: Parkour" is the ultimate cyberpunk endless runner game that will leave you breathless!. Parkour, slide, jump, and dodge obstacles while collecting coins to buy new clothes, weapons, and upgrades.

name: Sky is Arrows: Dragon Bracer Item Chest
summary: The Sky Is Arrows - Dragon Bracer Item Chest DLC unlocks 6 completely new, unique, and groundbreaking items. The player can use these items to enhance their current playstyle or create new strategies. It's up to the player to determine which items are the best from the random options given.

name: SkyFall Slime: Freefall Feast
summary:
"SkyFall Slime: Freefall Feast" is the ultimate freefall game designed for thrill-seekers of all ages! With its vibrant cartoony visuals, easy-to-learn controls, and challenging gameplay, your aerial journey will never be the same!
Our characters, lovable mixes of slime and balloon, tumble from the sky, shrinking as they fall. Keep them plump by swiping to collect falling food, but beware! The sky isn't as friendly as it seems. Dodge dangerous spikes that can instantly deflate your character and end your thrilling descent.
As you navigate this airborne world, pick up precious pearls to unlock new characters. With a myriad of colorful, cartoony characters to choose from, you'll find endless joy as you take to the skies.

name: SkyDribble
summary: Dribble the object to reach the goal! In the bottomless sky! A simple mouse-only 3D platformer game that anyone can enjoy.

name: Skippy's Diner
summary: Skippy's Diner is a short, but fun horror game that features great pixel art and 2d style 90s arcade aesthetic. The movement is basic but gives a sense of fatigue and struggle when trying to escape from Skippy. Featuring great sounds along with a good 90s arcade feel on the music as well.

name: Skeeter
summary:
Save yourself from the swarm of skeeters rising up from the deserted wastelands! Use power-ups to survive as long as you can! Achievements and high scores await.
Tap each skeeter as they fly on screen. If they land they will start to drain your life. The longer you last the more skeeters will find you.
Use multi-touch to fend off the hordes and collect power-ups. Once you have a power-up in your dashboard tap it to unleash its power.

name: Sky Is Arrows: Celestial Bow Item Chest
summary: This DLC introduces 20 captivating new items that will revolutionize your gameplay experience. With each item carefully designed to enhance your hero's abilities, you can forge your own path, adapt your playstyle, and unleash devastating strategies upon your enemies.

name: Skygard Arena
summary: Skygard Arena is a turn-based tactical RPG with a vibrant roster of MOBA-style Heroes. Assemble your squad, equip items and abilities, and outplay your opponents in fast-paced strategic battles. Discover the world of Skygard in a multi-campaign solo adventure, or fight in thrilling PvP matches!

name: Sky High Golf
summary:
Playing mini golf in the sky adds new challenges to the game because you will need to keep the ball on the platform. Sure there are some walls to bounce off, but it is the areas between this you will need to be careful of. Don’t Fall Off!
There are over 190 levels to play through. These levels are broken up into 4 different courses, Start Course, Long Course, Star Course and Village Course.

name: Sky the Scraper
summary: This is a building cleaning Roguelike action game, about a young man named Sky, who chases uncertain dreams as a building cleaner. Conquer thrilling randomly changing high-rise stages, upgrade skills and gear with your money and will, and find your path within a two-month limit.

name: Skylanders: Spyro's Adventure
summary:
Skylanders: Spyro's Adventure is the first video game in the Skylanders series. It is a video game that is played along with toy figures that interact with it through a "Portal of Power", that reads their tag through NFC and features the voices of Josh Keaton, Dave Wittenberg, Darin De Paul, Joey Camen, Audrey Wasilewski, Keythe Farley and Kevin Michael Richardson.

The 3DS ports of the first four Skylanders games are completely different from their home console counterparts in terms of gameplay and story.

name: Skylanders: Giants
summary:
Skylanders: Giants is a 2012 video game in the Skylanders series, a direct sequel to the 2011 game Skylanders: Spyro's Adventure and features the voices of Kevin Michael Richardson, Greg Ellis, Peter Lurie, Steve Blum, Dave Wittenberg, Carlos Alazraqui, Kevin Sorbo, Bobcat Goldthwait, Patrick Seitz and Julie Nathanson. It is the game before Skylanders: Swap Force. As the title suggests, it features larger Skylanders known as "Giants", along with other new gameplay mechanics.

The 3DS ports of the first four Skylanders games are completely different from their home console counterparts in terms of gameplay and story.

name: Skylanders: Swap Force
summary:
Skylanders: Swap Force is a platformer video game developed by Vicarious Visions and published by Activision. It is the third main game in the Skylanders video game and toy franchise, following 2012's Skylanders: Giants, which was a direct sequel to 2011's Skylanders: Spyro's Adventure (the spin-off of The Legend of Spyro series). It is the game before Skylanders: Trap Team and features the voices of John DiMaggio, Jess Harnell, Audrey Wasilewski, Richard Tatum, David Sobolov, Josh Keaton, Keythe Farley, Dave Wittenberg, Joey Camen, Gregg Berger, Troy Baker and Robin Atkin Downes.

The 3DS ports of the first four Skylanders games are completely different from their home console counterparts in terms of gameplay and story.

name: Skylanders: Trap Team
summary:
In Skylanders Trap Team, Kaos continues his ongoing quest to rule over Skylands. He has discovered the location of the legendary Cloudcracker Prison -- a fortress built entirely out of the magical substance Traptanium and home to Skylands’ most nefarious baddies. In an attempt to build his own army of foes, Kaos blows up the prison, releasing the most wanted villains and blasting shards of Traptanium to Earth in the form of Traps. Now it’s up to Portal Masters to recapture all of the escaped villains using powerful Traptanium Traps and defeat Kaos before it’s too late!

The 3DS ports of the first four Skylanders games are completely different from their home console counterparts in terms of gameplay and story.

name: Skyformer
summary: A first-person survival and automation game where you build factories run by drones to power a machine that terraforms a planet. Build bases, prepare for different types of storms, and harness the weather along the way!

name: Skeljump
summary: Experience the puzzle genre from a different perspective in this game! You must solve puzzles that get more complex as you progress by managing time well, using your reflexes and memory to overcome the challenges!

name: Skibidi Battle: Toilets Attack
summary: Unveil the universe of Skibidi Toilet, an addictive and engaging third person shooter video game inspired by the viral meme sensation.

name: Skull Island: Rise of Kong
summary: Embark on a 3rd person action-adventure quest to avenge the death of your parents at the hands of the ultimate alpha predator: Gaw. Conquer waves of primal beasts and defeat the minions of your arch-nemesis on your way to becoming the rightful King of Skull Island. Traverse the mysterious island and uncover lore and all the secrets the island has to offer as you encounter swamps, waterfalls, jungle, and skullite-filled caves that give the island’s flora and fauna its power.

name: Skirmish
summary: Skirmish is a Local-Multiplayer Top-Down Space Shooter where players choose a ship and have at it. The last ship in one piece is victorious!

name: Sky Harvest
summary: Sky Harvest is an Open World Farming Game set in a fantasy town named Magica where you play as Zacharias whose goal is to manage the farm on a floating island and supply the crops in the City below.

name: Sky Settlers
summary: Sky Settlers is a city building card game in which you can build on flying islands using different cards, complete quests and unlock new cards as you progress. But you have to be careful as disaster cards will unleash destruction upon your civilization.

name: Skystead Ranch
summary: Transform a desolate sky island into a vibrant sanctuary. Using your enchanted crook, cultivate your garden, befriend quirky creatures, build a home, and unlock secrets along the way. Each choice adds a personal touch to your unique Skystead Ranch!

name: Skogdal
summary: Skogdal is the rock 'n roll deckbuilder adventure game about a crazy Norwegian town during the 90's. Draft cards, recruit followers and explore the town across multiple runs. Why have the people of Skogdal gone mad? Play cards and find out!
