name: Skade
summary: Upon her fathers' death, a young Jotunn woman swears vengeance upon the gods and begins a journey towards Asgård.

name: Skinny Girls
summary: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Ski Jumping PVP
summary: Experience the thrill of being a ski jumping champion! Step into the shoes of a professional jumper and engage in exciting competitions against players from across the globe. Take on authentic ski jumps inspired by real-world locations.

name: Skyguard 0: Air Arcade
summary: Skyguard is a single player arcade flight combat game with stylized graphics and fast-paced gameplay. Switch between different squadrons, shred enemy in dogfight, engage groups of enemy with multi-lock weapons.

name: Sky Escort
summary: Sky Escort is a rouge-like card game featuring TD and management. Players roleplay an airborne mercenary,escorting clients' cargo to earn rewards. Buildcard decks, recruit crew members, and customize arms to enrich gameplay. Multiple factions can be chose from, each with unique combat style.

name: Skateboard Drifting Simulator with Maxwell Cat: The Game
summary: Skateboard Drifting Simulator with Maxwell Cat: The Game is an exhilarating skateboarding game that features meme characters navigating levels filled with obstacles. Customise your skateboard and perform stunts to earn points. With its vibrant art style and intuitive controls, it offers a fun arcade experience suitable for all skill levels.

name: Skulltiverse
summary:
Skulltiverse is a community project built around constrains in both playable space and build time. Each map was mostly completed within a week.

The wad contains 32 maps split into 6 themes - Techbase, Corrupt Techbase, Ruins, Marble Hell, Fleshy Hell and Void.

name: Skull Jones
summary: Skull Jones tells the story of a badass ladybug trying to change the natural selection of his habitat, where everyone judges his species as fragile.

name: Skinship
summary: Skinship is a large map for GZDoom with four new custom monsters, replacements for the cacodemon, imp, hellknight and baron of hell. They were all taken from realm667 and modified by me for balance's sake. Freelook is recommended. Dynamic lights should be turned on. Otherwise, important switches could be missed.

name: Skeler Boy
summary: Experience a nostalgic aesthetic right out of 1970s and 1980s cultural classics, with adventure gameplay and a dark and disturbing narrative!

name: Skepland
summary: An attempt to create difficult, non-linear maps in the plutonia visual style, without going the slaughterfest route.

name: Sky Sojourn
summary: Welcome to the world of Sky Sojourn! You are an adventurer who embarks on an amazing journey overcoming obstacles on floating islands. Will you be able to conquer the peaks and reach your goal? Get ready for an unforgettable climb full of amazing discoveries!

name: Sky Hex
summary: Sky Hex is a magnetic logic game that will brighten up your free time!

name: SkySouls
summary: Third Person Action and Adventure Game in the style of D.Souls. fantasy world where kings and magical creatures collide in an epic showdown. In the realm of SkySouls, peace is threatened by the evil Demon King Ossur, who opens a portal to hell unleashing destruction.

name: Skyline Sprinters
summary: Welcome to an adrenaline-pumping platform game where players embark on an exhilarating race against each other through a challenging parkour course! Prepare to test your agility, speed, and reflexes as you navigate through an immersive world filled with obstacles, traps, and exciting surprises.

name: Skibidi War: Toilets Attack
summary: A war between the Skibidi Toilets and the camera heads has broken out. Defend against the relentless onslaught of Skibidi toilets in this epic war.

name: Skibidi Toilet Hero
summary: You are the last Cameraman who will have to fight off the army of Skybidy Toilets with the help of various weapons and cheerful music.

name: Skibidi Toilet Attack
summary: Take control of the Skibidi Toilet and destroy all pinatas with his powerful guns.

name: Skibidi Toilet Skibidi Boom
summary: Get ready for a hilariously outrageous multiplayer FPS experience that combines the meme world of the Skibidi toilet with intense action-packed battles! In "Skibidi Toilet Skibidi Boom" you'll dive headfirst into a quirky universe where two bizarre factions clash for supremacy: the eccentric Cameraheads and the wacky Skibidi Toilets.

name: Skeletons Uprising
summary: Play alone or grab up to 4 friends and survive wave-based rounds and special enemies. Collect parts, Craft special items, and Explore the maps to unlock secrets and increase your chances of survival. Have fun and stay alive.

name: Skibidi Toilets: Invasion
summary: Welcome to Skibidi Invasion, a heart-pounding FPS zombie shooter where you must obliterate cyborg toilets and restore order to a world in chaos! Armed with an array of weapons, unleash your fury against the rebellious toilets across seven distinct locations, each offering its own challenges and opportunities for strategic mayhem.

name: SkibidiVerse
summary: SkibidiVerse is a captivating game where you will take on the role of the camzeraman tasked with saving the planet.

name: Skibidi Toilet Killer
summary: You are the Cameraman. Go around the map and shoot down the Skibidi Toilets to finish the stage, or else they will defeat you.

name: Sky Islands
summary:
Switch between 2D and 3D! Sky Islands is a charming platformer game where you embark on a captivating journey through a fantastic sky realm. Inspired by the beloved FEZ game, prepare to shift between the 2D and 3D dimensions to collect hidden stars and clear all the levels.

It is a mobile port of the browser game Sky Island.

name: Skull Scavenger
summary:
Skull Scavenger is an unforgiving twin-stick Extraction Looter Shooter where you are a soul trying to get out of hell.

Procedurally generated maps ensure you never escape from the same level twice!

name: Skyscraper
summary: Single-screen shooter for PC88.

name: Sky Conquest
summary: In short, Sky Conquest is a fun platform game to play with friends, with cute graphics and competitive gameplay. Download it for free right now on Steam and get ready to jump in and have some fun!

name: Ski Rush
summary: Ski down the mountain as long as possible avoiding obstacles. Collect flags to increase your score!

name: Skull Island: Rise of Kong - Colossal Edition
summary: This edition includes 8 exclusive film grains featuring the ability to experience a red-tinted rage mode and the original look of the classic 1933 and 1970s era King Kong films, the Kong style pack with 8 different colors so you can choose-your-own Kong color, a boss-rush mode allowing you to defeat all the titans of Skull Island, and a behind-the-scenes exclusive pack including looks at in-game artwork and the all-original orchestral soundtrack.

name: Skybreakers
summary: Choose from a variety of classes, arm yourself with a vast array of weapons, and create your own unique build by combining treasures, random talents, cultivation methods, and bonds. Use unique abilities to defeat a variety of monsters, demons, and devils.

name: Skibidi: Escape from Toilets
summary: "Skibidi: Escape from Toilets" is a cooperative horror game for 1-4 players. TV MANs are trying to get through creepy and atmospheric locations that are filled with dangerous SKIBIDI TOILETS - they want to kill you! Free content updates with new levels and game modes - YES YES YES!

name: Skinny Norris
summary: "A large tower-like Quoth single player map with an unusual texture theme and independent puzzles/traps routes," originally started for the Vertical Competition (=768*768 base with unlimited vertical height, no player teleportation).

name: Skull Dash
summary:
This Halloween night, when darkness falls and the eerie howls of the wind are heard, we offer a unique entertainment experience for you and your friends.
Skull Dash: Ghost Master offers you an adventure filled with 8 separate horror-themed mini-games. All games contain different tasks. Try to reach the highest score by using your reflexes.

name: SkateNationXL
summary: Get ready to dive into a realistic skateboarding adventure! Explore skateparks, urban landscapes, and iconic spots. User-friendly controls, advanced tricks, and a rewarding progression system for the ultimate skateboarding experience. Stay tuned for updates!

name: Skull Island: Rise of Kong - Colossal Pack
summary: Embark on a quest to avenge the death of your parents at the hands of the alpha predator: Gaw. This pack includes 8 exclusive film grains including a black and white noir filter, 8 Kong style variants , an exclusive boss-rush game mode, and a behind-the-scenes look at the making of the game

name: Skolly's Adventure
summary: Explore a sky filled with floating islands as Skolly, an unusual adventurer in search of all the hidden treasures of this forgotten world.

name: Skies Above
summary: When the last Leviathan begins its dangerous escape from the planet, as the leader of a small warrior group, it's your turn to protect it from the robot army of the greedy mega-corporation.

name: Skola
summary: A recreation of what can only be described as a school of sorts

name: Skibidi Backrooms
summary: Skibidi Backrooms is a cooperative horror game for a group of 4 players. Solo mode is also available. You have to survive among the backrooms and find a way out before you are overtaken by the Skibidi toilet. Updates and various interesting things await you...

name: Skycity
summary: Skycity uses new textures, graphics and new sounds for the weapons. The level is set in a sort of abandoned megastructure, similar to a large shopping mall made out of concrete and marble. Spiderwebs and noticeable signs can be found all around. The map design is complex and intricate, with several interconnected areas and pathways that the player can choose, which encourages exploration due to the non-linearity of the map, and all the hidden and secret spots that can be found. It is a very early example of a semi-realistic map trying to recreate an urban-like structure.

name: Skyewood
summary: Play Doom outside in a forest, complete with angry trees, groovy mushrooms, exploding toads and a real dragon!

name: Skibidi.io
summary: Your goal is to eat, grow and evolve! As you grow and evolve, you will unlock special abilities and powers to help you in your quest for victory.

name: Sky Fury
summary: Hold on tight for this thrilling arcade-style air racing game. Equipped with various weapons, you will need to use strategy and skill to achieve victory. Play in single-player or versus mode and unlock new circuits and planes.

name: Sky Hunter
summary: Who can become a monster-fighting warrior? I heard that young ladies like such warriors.

name: SkyFly
summary: A casual, high flying racing game

name: Skibidi Shooter: Survival FPS
summary: Confront Skibidi Toilet and other alphabet monsters or become Skibidi Toilet, the choice is your. Beware of the horror behind the doors in this arena.

name: Sky Fighters
summary: A top-down, fast-paced shooter where you pilot a plane and use it to dogfight against those that seek to bring you down. Easy to understand but hard to master, the balance of risk-reward for score maximization while trying to not get overwhelmed is what this game is about! Try to reach to the highest score!

name: Skul: The Hero Slayer - Mythology Pack
summary: A mythical skull has descended upon Harmonia! This is the first DLC of Skul: The Hero Slayer, a story about a special little skeleton, Skul, who fights humans to save the captured demon king.

name: Skibidi Toilet India
summary: You have to eliminate an army of walking toilets. To accomplish this task, you will have access to a variety of weapons. Additionally, there is a titan boss in the game who is the leader of the toilet army, and you must defeat him to win the game. So, get ready with your weapons!

name: Skyforce Unite!
summary:
Amazing Aerial Combat Simulation Attack Monsters in the Uncivilized Land!
Get yourself a plane and fly through the wild blue yonder!
Take on missions for the Hunters Association, explore the world and battle monsters. Create your very own team of helpers, mercenaries and apprentices, and head out on expeditions!

name: Skywire VIP
summary: Guess the skywire celebrities in this spin off from the Skywire series!

name: Skeleport Energy
summary:
Skeleport Energy will take you on a wild journey through unpredictable locations as Skully The Skeleton! Your mission is to find your way out of crazy whacky situations by reaching a vending machine that sells Skeleport Energy- Energy drink!

With Skeleport Energy, Skully can become anyone's skeleton! Only problem being, that Skully has no control over, who they'll become and this leads into many problematic situations that you'll have to figure your way out of!

name: Skuf Simulator
summary: Skuf Simulator is a cooperative, humorous simulator of real life skuf, based on a popular meme. In the game, you and your friends can take on the role of a skuf and participate in various fun and absurd mini-games and contests.

name: Sky Fortress: Odyssey
summary: Embark on a steampunk-style grand adventure where technology and fantasy merge, unveiling the secrets of the world of Setsemir!

name: SkyMatch
summary: Use your battle-ready rover to race across the enormous landscape. Blow UFOs and aliens out of the sky with your top-mounted gun. If you love shooting and blowing things up, you'll love this open-world action game. Stunning graphics powered by Unreal Engine 5.

name: Skyline Sprint: Turbo Tracks
summary: Race through the skies, master aerial stunts, and unlock cars in Skyline Sprint: Turbo Tracks. Collect stars, conquer levels, and enhance immersion with optional Perspectacles head tracking glasses. Become the champion of high-speed, airborne racing! Pick a car and give it a Go!

name: SKD
summary: Challenging action-adventure with stylish characters and sick combat (soulslike inspired) in a furry anime world.

name: Skibidi Toilet
summary: Fight against the Skibidi Toilets. Try and survive all 5 nights.

name: Sker Ritual: Bloody Night
summary: He knows if you've been bad or good! Bloody Night, featuring a new mask alongside a Premium menu background and more!

name: Skyts
summary: Have you always dreamed of diving into a world where your creativity and strategic skills are the key to success? Welcome to Skyts, the 2D fighting game that puts your imagination first!

name: Skeleton Rebellion
summary: A turn-based RPG about a skeleton who sets out to take back an unjust, institutionalized mage tower, with the help of some fairly likely allies.

name: Skywire 2
summary:
Skywire 2 is the sequel to the game Skywire, and was released on June 2nd, 2008. It is the second game in the Skywire series. Like the original Skywire, the player controls a cable car and tries to safely carry three passengers to the station, avoiding robotic animals such as ostriches, parrots, rhinos, and camels.
This game was made a distributable game on July 18th, 2012. An HTML5 port of the game was released on Poki during the time period of June 10th - August 13th, 2021[1], with a Nitrome website release following later.

name: Skirmish Squad
summary: Choose your characters and establish your strategy! Strengthen your party with endless upgrades as you ascend the tower.

name: Skullgirls: Marie
summary: She lived long enough to become a villain, but died to become a hero: at long last MARIE joins the Skullgirls cast! This DLC includes Marie, her new stage, 29 palettes, character tutorials/trials, and full Story Mode.

name: Ski Jump Challange 2024
summary: Leap into the world of ski jumping with Ski Jump Challenge! Elevate your gaming experience with stunning graphics, advanced physics, and customizable controls. Compete on over 90 hills, customize your gear, and challenge players worldwide. The ultimate ski jumping simulation for your PC is here!

name: Skibidi Friends
summary: Skibidi Friends is a co-op puzzle platformer based on the Skibidi Toilet meme.

name: Skiddy
summary:
A Commodore 64 game for the 2022 Reset64 4k 'Craptastic' games competition.

For 1 or 2 players.

Beat the competition in 5, 10 or 20-lap races of the track in cars with bald tyres.

For joystick only - plug into port 1 to drive the yellow car and port 2 to drive the blue car.

Hold fire to accelerate and release fire to brake. Move the joystick left or right to steer your car. Sprint to the finish and set a lap record; beat your friends or the latest in self-driving autopilot software.

Skiddy was designed for PAL Commodore 64s but is also NTSC compatible.

name: Ski Simulator: Winter Sports
summary: In "Ski Simulator: Winter Sports," players are on a quest to earn points and unlock new levels by mastering the art of skiing or snowboarding. Navigate through the exhilarating slopes, collecting checkpoints along the way to progress further in the game. But beware, time is of the essence – the clock is ticking, and every second counts!

name: Skullman Kills
summary:
A boss rush game based on the Megaman series.

Skullman has attained full sentience and has decided he's had enough with Dr. Wily. Now, Wily's out to stop him and bring him back for reprogramming! Are you a bad enough skeleton to defeat Wily and his gang of minions?

name: Skull Man Kills 2: Mega Man 2 II - Blood Vengeance
summary:
The official sequel to Skull Man Kills. Features full levels, Mega Man X-style dashing and walljumping and more.

After Wily's defeat, Skull Man has returned back to Cossack's lab, only to be stuck doing menial labor. But, as fate would have it, Skull Man must return to action after Wily threatens Earth once more with a strangely familiar band of robots... and Mega Man is nowhere to be found!

name: Skate
summary:
A mobile port of Skate that captures the essence and authenticity of the console title, it features professional skaters such as Danny Way, Chris Cole, Mike Carroll and Rob Dyrdek for players to interact with.

Players must skate their way through the fictional city of San Vanelona on a mission to become a skateboarding superstar by pulling off enough slick moves to capture the cameras and land on the cover of Thrasher magazine. There are twelve missions divided in four goals each.

There is also a freestyle mode with three explorable areas: Plaza, Halfpipe and Downtown.

name: Skillwood
summary: Skillwood is a survival simulator highlighting resource foraging. Chop trees, mine stones, and skillfully level up your abilities to upgrade buildings with the gathered resources. Go through the continous progression by unlocking more areas and buildings

name: Sky Balloon Freakout DX
summary:
A highscore game, where you play as a balloon avoiding a fighter-jet and bullets.
"Saddle up, airman! We've got a bogey at Angels 40!" -Someone, Somewhere

name: Skipper & Skeeto: The Mystery of the Talking Sundial
Skibidi Toilets
summary: Start the Skibidi Toilet battle and claim as much territory as you can with your toilet. Beware of the other Skibidi Toilets as they have their own territories and are able to break your toilet in a direct collision or just roll across your wet trail.

name: Skyward Dream
summary: Explore the depths of your mind in Skyward Dream. A first-person platforming adventure set within the interconnected layers of your mind. Navigate surreal dreamscapes, unlock platforming abilities, and confront your inner demons. Can you overcome the challenges of your subconsciousness?

name: Skybound: Card Survival
summary: You're exiled to floating islands by the Gods, forced to entertain them forever. Stripped of your free will, you are cursed to act only through cards. Gather resources, battle monsters and survive the night. Explore the mysterious world and lead your character to triumph.

name: Sky Kid
summary:
The NES Port of Sky Kid.
You are the legendary Red Baron, flying a plane through a horizontal side-scrolling scenery set during World War I. To complete a mission, you simply need to get to the landing spot on the other side without being shot down, but you can gain extra points by destroying enemy vehicles and planes. For huge points, pick up a bomb hidden in the level (you will be warned by a sound when approaching it) and drop it on a large structure. If you fail to land on the landing strip, you run out of fuel and crash.

You can only shoot horizontally and diagonally by tilting the plane's nose. When in trouble, perform an aerial loop with the secondary button, this often destroys other planes and avoids bullets. There is a co-op mode with the character Max as well.

name: Sky Dreamer
summary: VT03 (16-bit graphics) port of Sky Dreamer.

name: Sketchy's Contract
summary: A co-op sci-fi horror where players travel to exotic planets to farm minerals, kill creatures, and/or find hidden loot that can be brought to an asteroid belt and turned in for rewards.

name: Skateboard Gravity
summary: Skateboard Gravity: A Journey into the Gravitational World

name: Skill Up!
summary: It's time to jump and run! Skill Up provides an extremely satisfying 3D Jump & Run experience combined with exciting colorful stages that wait be mastered... with nothing but pure skill and the might of your hands!

name: Sky Journey: Cozy Mornings
summary: Find hidden objects from a peaceful post-apocalyptic world while relaxing in the company of a fun little boy and his robot friend!

name: Skeleton War
summary: Welcome to Skeleton War. It is a light action game that blends Roguelite and Survivor-like features into one. Each map consists of a number of well-designed levels that culminate in a hunt for bosses, exploring each unique gameplay experience in repeated rounds of exhilaration and excitement.

name: Skid Island: Asphalt Mayhem
summary: Drift, jump and be fast, make cash and tune your cars! Upgrade your ride for smoother drifts and challenge other players.

name: Skyland
summary: In this gorgeous FTL-inspired tactical RTS, you and your crew must take command of a flying castle, and defend it from sky pirates while fighting enemies of increasing difficulty. Originally developed for Gameboy Advance, now available on Steam!

name: Skulls of Olympus
summary: Skulls of Olympus is an action RPG where you collect Gods from Greek Mythology to battle across dozens of worlds.

name: Skyward
summary:
A great journey to the sky starts with a single step.
Through dynamic Escher-style labyrinths you will reach your inner peace in this endless one-tap-one-step gam
Or push your patience and reflexes to the limit in a brand new dark hardcore mode!
Tap on the screen at the right time, when the circle is above the tile, to make a step.
Get higher scores to unlock new patterns and beat everyone in the leaderboard!

name: Sky Dominion
summary: Sky Dominion is a War Simulation-like shooter where the player has to protect their aircraft, while being attacked from the ground, until the aircraft reaches the end of its capabilities and the round ends. At the end of every round the player can see the score they reached.

name: Skulltide
summary: Skeletal mischief reigns as the Skulltide begins! Join the undead in co-op adventures as the skeleton of your dreams, or lead them yourself, and hunt down the necromancers who reanimated you. Try not to misplace your bones along the way!

name: Sky Kid
summary: The Super Cassette Vision port of Sky Kid.

name: Skeleton Messi
summary: This is a game similar to Vampire Survivor. You are a skeleton named Messi with just a skull and a body, but you want to be the richest, the most powerful and the kindest in this world.

name: Sker Ritual: Murder Express
summary: Get on the right track and have your tickets at the ready for the Murder Express, featuring a new mask alongside a Premium menu background and more!

name: Sker Ritual: Headless Wanderer
summary: Let’s face it, you’ve been known to turn a few heads, featuring a new mask alongside a Premium menu background and more!

name: Skuf's Day
summary: A visually stunning novel with beautiful and animated graphics will immerse you in a world that needs to be saved from the alcohol virus. Only SCUF can do it, if he gets off his couch.

name: Skybase
summary: Spaceship building sandbox game. Build various spaceships from scratch and explore the cosmos. Fight different enemies and mine metals and materials to fix or expand your spaceship fleet.

name: Skyland Wars
summary: Skyland Wars is a strategy game set in the world of sky islands. In this fantasy-filled sky world, you can send airship teams to freely navigate the sky, gather resources, and drive away roaming air pirates to construct your own sky city. You can also explore ruins and dungeons full of unknowns and challenges. Each adventure is a completely new experience, as you delve into dungeons with your heroes and troops, searching for ancient treasures while resisting unpredictable enemies and traps.

name: Skuf Backrooms
summary: Have you ever wondered what might be waiting for you when you once again leave the confines of your apartment? And you obviously didn't realize that an ordinary walk to the garbage chute could turn into your nightmare.

name: Sky Aces 2
summary: Journey back to the WWII era and become an esteemed air ace in this arcade game. Engage in a variety of offensive, defensive, and support missions, piloting a selection of classic aircraft that can be upgraded to unlock their full potential.

name: Skee-Ball Plus
summary:
Skee-Ball Plus is fun and action packed alley bowling game which you can now take with you wherever you go.

The game captures all the fun of the original arcade game, features a host of new game variants.

name: Skyblivion
summary:
Skyblivion is the ultimate fan-made experience for the Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion, bringing the game into the newer engine of the Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim. This process combines Oblivion’s impressive award-winning open-world that is renowned for its incredible gameplay, memorable quests, and expansive world space with the advancements in gaming that have been made in the last two decades. Set in the Elder Scroll’s Third Era, during the cataclysmic Oblivion Crisis, you must help to restore the Imperial throne and repel the demonic Daedric invasion.

Skyblivion will feature the remastered entirety of Oblivion’s mainland, Cyrodiil, from the wintery slopes of the Valus and Jerall Mountains to the swamps of Blackwood and warm-beachy shores of the Gold Coast. Skyblivion will bring the return of many classic Oblivion mechanics like spell crafting, a complete class and attributes system, underwater combat, and NPC disposition.

In addition to recreating Oblivion’s systems and porting them into the Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim’s engine the project has taken great care in providing new improvements and additions. Skyblivion offers fans remastered graphics, weather, and lighting, an expanded soundtrack, new gameplay mechanics, and even a limited selection of bespoke minor quests with original voice acting to further flesh out barren areas of Oblivion—all for free!

Once Skyblivion is released in 2025, fans will have access to the entirety of Oblivion’s pre-DLC world space, systems, and quests available for play. But that’s not the end of the project! Following a period of bug-fixing and community-supported updates the project development team will move on to working on Oblivion’s nine additional content releases plus the Shivering Isles expansion.

With Skyblivion you experience the best of both worlds: The complex and detailed RPG experience of Oblivion paired with Skyrim’s newer systems, graphics, and quality of life improvements. Will you close shut the jaws of Oblivion once more in 2025?

name: Skygerfall
summary:
This is an Alternate Start mod where you can play through the entire Main Quest of TESII: Daggerfall in the TESV engine, at the end of which you can choose to continue your character's adventures in Skyrim, taking all your loot, experience and new spells with you! It is now listed under Quests and Adventures, since there is no New Lands category.

They said it couldn't be done... Daggerfall is too big to fit in the TESV engine... And they were, on the one hand, right! You cannot capture the grand scale or the nearly endless possibilities that exist in a world larger than England! Yet, for all of its vastness and promise, Daggerfall remains a world unfamiliar to many Elder Scrolls fans. The mechanics and graphics feel dated to say the least, and its sometimes unreasonable time limits for quests as well as quest-breaking bugs left many players, even back in the '90's, so frustrated that perhaps a majority of players never finished the Main Quest, preferring to simply explore the world on their own terms, joining guilds or Knightly Orders, or becoming a vampire or a wereboar. And that is a shame, because the Main Quest is actually quite a good story. The purpose of this mod is not to replace TESII: Daggerfall, but to bring some of its magic and lore to Elder Scrolls fans of the Skyrim generation that would never otherwise experience it, as well as perhaps delight those fans of the original game that would love to see the Main Quest in an updated engine, complete with voice acting, re-mastered music and better graphics.

Please note that the Main Quest of Daggerfall is NOT about choice. You are role-playing as the Emperor's friend on an important mission, so, while the order in which you tackle these quests is your choice, it is assumed that you want to finish the Main Quest and so you will not be able to refuse the quest-givers' requests. At this point, there really isn't much of anything other than the Main Quest for you to do in Daggerfall, anyway!

I have worked on this mod in my spare time for a little over two years, and have had a lot of fun learning about various aspects that go into making a large mod the size of a dlc. I'm not much of a 3D artist, so I've had to rely on a lot of resources to put this mod together, and you will see that the credits list is quite long. I have tried to include, where possible, those models from artists who have made resources to see something from Daggerfall come to later Elder Scrolls games, such as JMan0WarS, who remade Privateer's Hold for Morrowind as well as Direnni Tower for Oblivion, Lord Berandas and BobJohnson99. As per Bethesda's instructions, all assets included in this mod for Skyrim have been remade, and not simply ported from the original Daggerfall game.

name: Sky Shark
summary:
The NES port of Sky Shark. Sky Shark (released in Japan as "Hi Sho Zame", and in Europe as "Flying Shark")is a military-themed vertically scrolling shoot 'em up game in which players take control of the titular biplane through five increasingly difficult levels in order to defeat an assortment of military enemy forces like tanks, battleships, airplanes and artillery as the main objective. The title initially appears to be very standard, as players control their plane over a constantly scrolling background and the scenery never stops moving until a runway is reached. Players have only two weapons at their disposal: the standard shot that travels a max distance of the screen's height and three bombs.

The bombs are powerful weapons capable of obliterating any enemy caught within its blast radius. Various items are scattered through every stage that appear by destroying certain enemies: Shooting down colored waves of enemy planes spawn items like "S" power-up icons, point bonuses and extra lives. Certain enemies on the ground spawn "B" icons that increases the player's bomb stock when destroyed.
Every time the player lands at a runway beyond the first takeoff, the amount of bombs multiply 3000 points to the player's total score.

Players are given three lives initially and bonus lives are awarded at 50000 points and thereafter. The game employs a checkpoint system in which a downed single player will start off at the beginning of the checkpoint they managed to reach before dying. Getting hit by enemy fire will result in losing a live, as well as a penalty of decreasing the plane's firepower to his original state and once all lives are lost, the game is over unless players insert more credits into the arcade machine to continue playing. Completing the last stage restarts the game with the second loop increasing in difficulty.

name: Sky Lanes
summary:
Sky Lanes is an homage to the 90s MS-DOS arcade racing game Skyroads.
You race on straight courses, evade obstacles and jump onto different lanes.

The game supports ray-traced reflections and ambient occlusion, but it's not a requirement and can be disabled.

name: Sky End Market
summary: Set up shelves, arrange products, and make your store bigger and bigger. Sell your goods to the remaining people, animals, and robots in the last place on earth just before the human race is exterminated.

name: Skippy's Grand Escape
summary: Escape increasingly complex mazes as fast as possible. Watch out for enemies, traps, black holes and more in this minimalistic space themed top down runner.

name: Skyward Battles
summary: An arcade shooting game with air battles. Operate your battle plane using the Playdate's crank control.

name: Sky Ahoy
summary: In this steampunk RPG, adventure into a world of floating islands, pirates and robots. Craft and dismantle with a unique forging system and watch as the world changes around you based off your choices. Will you be a hero, a pirate or break the system and become a revolutionary?

name: Skulduggery Pleasant Invaders
summary: Skulduggery Pleasant Invaders is an online video game. It involves trying to stop Darquesse and her army of clones.

name: Skully Bunnies
summary:
Skully Bunnies is a fast paced, competitive, party card game. To win the game, a player must be the first to fuse 3 Skully Bunnies together. Strategy fused with luck of the draw creates intense gameplay. The fun factor to this game is not only unique, but highly contagious. Skully Bunnies mobile card game creates new fast paced action mixed like never before.

Skully Bunnies pits players against each other in a strategic battle to fuse 3 Skully Bunnies in order to win. Players share one deck and have every advantage and disadvantage the game offers, it's all based on luck of the draw and how you play your cards. Players will draw from the same deck using the same types of cards throughout the game: bunnies, skulls, fusion items, spells, spell-cancel and Skully Bunnies. As players draw cards from the deck and put cards into play they will be challenged by other players using spell cards. To win the game use everything at your disposal to fuse three Skully Bunnies based on the number of players. It doesn’t matter how you do it, you just gotta be the first one! Turns go clockwise around the table, and each turn is made up of four phases.

name: Skarab
summary: Arise warrior, your kingdom has need of you. Wield ancient weaponry and harness arcane powers in your quest to liberate Egypt, rescue her royal highness, and exile Anubis to the afterlife.

name: Skibidi Revenge
summary: Vampire-like game about toilets and cameras.

name: Sky Jumping
summary: Sky Jumping is a challenging first-person platformer.Complete all the challenges, get to the top and leave your message for future conquerors.

name: Skyrift: Aratirí
summary:
Skyrift: Aratirí is a racing game from Paraguay where players can enjoy the first digital rally championship, although it will also feature other competitive modes.

The game also features a social network called SKYLINK where users can share their profiles, their customized cars, posts, make friends, and share news and memes.

name: Skvears
summary: Skvears is a short, casual single-player adventure RPG.

name: Sky Fields
summary: Sky Fields is a Voxel Monster-Tamer. Recruit, battle and trade Goobers to build your ultimate team! You'll need a well-structured team with tanks, supports, and damage dealers to progress far on your journey.

name: Skies
summary:
Skies is a post-apocalyptic tactical RPG with user-driven economics and tokenomics where you can mine resources , craft goods, launch and rule your business, create a clan, fight for the desert and cities and much more.

There is a World map in the center of Skies with such options as Character, Factories (list of factories - filtered by the distance from the character's location), Clans, NFT market, Business (My factories, Rented locations).

name: Skyformer
summary: A first-person survival and automation game where you build factories run by drones to power a machine that terraforms a planet. Build bases, prepare for storms, and harness the weather along the way.

name: Skateboard Knight
summary: Hop on a skateboard and casually save the world! Simple controls—just move up or down the lanes. Horizontal movement and attacks are all auto!

name: Skibidi Toilet Battle
summary: Battle between robot alliance and toilet monster army. Choose your favorite character to fight, silly characters and weird attacks will make a crazy match

name: Skools Out
summary: Skools Out is an educational adventure game for younger players. The main character, a boy named Derek, must try within twenty days to make sure that the sheet of paper with the latest results of his scientific achievements does not reach home. The notes there are not among the highest, so it would be better not to get them in the hands of parents.

name: Skyland Farmer
summary: Skyland Farmer is a farming simulation where you grow crops, develop new varieties through hybrid breeding, and manage sales and contests. Plan your layout, refine your produce, and build a farm that suits your playstyle. With pixel art and a focus on freedom, every harvest is your own creation.

name: SkyFighters 1945
summary:
SkyFighters 1945 puts you in the cockpit of a World War II-era fighter plane and sends you off to do battle in the skies over Europe or the South Pacific. You can embark on any of 30 missions, each with unique objectives, diverse topographies, and distinct enemy planes. The game supports network play by as many as eight players on a LAN or the Internet. You can also compete head-to-head in a dogfight against a computer-controlled aircraft.

SkyFighters lacks the intricate flight-control systems that high-end flight simulators offer, and its garish graphics sometimes give the game a cartoonish feel. But the mechanics of flying aren’t difficult to master, and the animation is fast and fluid, even on low-end systems.

name: Skibidi Mahr Simulator 64
summary:
An Indie horror platformer that takes inspiration from movie tie-in games from the early 2000s.
You play as a silent protagonist looking for a cure for a mysterious disease they are suffering from.
Travel through several eerie locations, but beware of the evil mahrnster...

name: Skyfish Rising
summary: Skyfish has to bubble-shoot and blast his way through tons of cartoon levels in a strange and tough-as-nails 2D shooter game!

name: Skills and Slimes
summary: Slay slimes and save humanity!

name: Skyblocker
summary: Skyblocker is a 3D puzzle game in which players build towers from toy blocks and try to set a global high score while battling wind and weather. It also features a "zen" mode with no scoring or time constraints, so the player can build, relax, and enjoy multiple different picturesque locales.

name: Skylanders: Spyro's Adventure - Empire of Ice
summary: Empire of Ice is an Adventure Pack level in Skylanders: Spyro's Adventure that comes with the Skylander Slam Bam.

name: Skelethrone: The Chronicles of Ericona - Complete Edition
summary: This Edition includes Skelethrone: The Chronicles of Ericona, plus The Jewel in the Skull DLC.

name: Sketch, Share, Solve: Video Games & Animals
summary: A fan-made puzzle pack of 32 nonogram challenges for Sketch, Share, Solve.

name: Skilander
summary:
Grab your Ski's and race downhill while avoid melting ice caps and perilous pits in Skilander!

Proudly utilizing Ken Silverman's Build engine to provide what's possibly the first ever tactical FPS (First Person Skiing) game ever!

Skilander is a game designed with the fun of speedrunning in mind and comes with an easy Quick reset, encouraging competitive play and improving your times through the built-in high score system.

You play as Connor MacGleisberg, taking on the challenge of mastering 3 difficult Skiing slopes.

But you are not alone! The legendary ski shop maintainer Seppo from the city of Jaemsae is there to provide you valuable assitance! Remember – when in doubt, the right way is always the downhill.

Reach speeds you could have never imagined before and control the awesome power of "Snowquelching"!

name: Sky Revolver
summary: Sky Revolver is a guns blazing old-school shoot-em-up game just like they did in ‘90s! You play as a hotheaded space pilot destined to destroy the evil Empire. Your main goal is to survive through the endless waves of enemy spaceships and shuttles and to defeat the high command!

name: SkyTemple Randomizer
summary:
Randomizer for Pokémon Mystery Dungeon Explorers of Sky. For Windows, macOS and Linux.

This randomizer randomizes...
- ... all NPCs on the overworld (with matching portraits and names; additional portraits are downloaded from the PMDCollab Sprite Repository)
- ... all dungeon layouts (including tilesets, music, weather, darkness, traps, items, Pokémon spawns, etc.)
- ... Pokémon moves, types, abilities
- ... boss fights matching the NPCs and boss fight layouts
- ... chapter names and location names.
- ... if wanted: all text in the game.

Pokémon level are randomized between -3/+3 of the minimum/maximum level that the Pokémon on that floor had in the original game.

Additionally patches by End45 to improve gameplay are installed. All settings can be toggled off!
Also contains additional optional patches, like the Complete Team Control Patch from Cipnit.

name: Skating Rink Story
summary: Make your wildest ice dreams come true with this skating rink management game.

name: Skyrim Anniversary Edition + Fallout 4 G.O.T.Y. Bundle
summary:
Get Bethesda Game Studios' post-nuclear and epic fantasy masterpieces with more than 250 Game of the Year Awards bundled at a reduced price.

The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Anniverary Edition
Winner of more than 200 Game of the Year Awards, The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim celebrates 10 years of adventuring in stunning detail. The Anniversary Edition includes a decade worth of content: the critically acclaimed core game and add-ons of Skyrim Special Edition, plus Creation Club content released on or prior to November 11, 2021 - including quests, dungeons, bosses, weapons, spells, and more. For a full list of Creation Club content included read here (https://beth.games/3GzzeZS)

Fallout 4: Game of the Year Edition
Get the complete post-nuclear adventure from Bethesda Game Studios and winner of more than 200 ‘Best Of’ awards, including the DICE and BAFTA Game of the Year. Fallout 4 G.O.T.Y. includes the critically acclaimed core game and all six official add-ons including Automatron, Wasteland Workshop, Far Harbor, Contraptions Workshop, Vault-Tec Workshop, and Nuka-World.

name: Sky Up: Keep Alive
summary: Protect your voyager with one finger while it is rising up. Clear your way as you reach higher and higher! The voyager is very fragile, even one little obstacle can kill it.

name: Skelethrone: The Chronicles of Ericona - The Jewel in the Skull
summary: Embark on a mysterious adventure where the shadows of the past intertwine with the threats of the present. You will venture into the labyrinth ship of the mad genius Mardek in search of a legendary artifact – “The Jewel in the Skull”. Using this artifact, you can enter the Ghost World and uncover the truth about Demagrass, the brother of Queen Aurora, whose fate is enshrouded in mystery and intrigue.

name: Skydiving Simulator: Wingsuit Flight
summary: From sky to earth, the adventure never ends.

name: Sky Aces
summary: Become one of the air aces of the WWI. Help allies to end a brutal and never-ending war.

name: Skye
summary: Experience Skye: The Misty Isle as it is now. Dive into a world built from our efforts to date. Note: This EA release marks our current progress during a pause in development. If you're looking for continuous new features, you might prefer to wait for updates about the game. Your journey awaits.

name: Skatelander
summary: Features stunning voxel art style with around 60 different characters and beautiful environments. Lots of crazy stunts and skateboards to set your wheels rolling. Show off your style of play by sharing videos with your friends.

name: Sketchman
summary: Lookout evil doers, Sketchman is here! Jump, double jump, glide and shoot your way through hordes of enemies and hazards in this new exciting runner!

name: Skrach.it
summary:
Skrach.it is a free, fast-paced browser quiz game where less is more.
Players scratch away hidden images to reveal just enough visual clues to answer trivia questions. The quicker you guess and the less you reveal - the higher your score. With simple gameplay, sleek visuals, and a competitive scoring system, Skrach.it is perfect for quick sessions or high-score showdowns with friends. No installs, just scratch, think, and score.

name: SkullX: Aibohphobia
summary: You were hired to extract a bioengineer. Now your team is cut off, your comms are dead, and you're surrounded by something wearing human skin. Hold the line, make the calls, and survive the night in this choice-driven visual novel with turn-based combat.

name: Sky Dreamer
summary: Sky Dreamer blends sci-fi adventure with relaxed productivity. Use a customizable Pomodoro timer and to-do lists to stay on task as floating cities grow and futuristic landscapes inspire you. Discover soothing sounds and dynamic challenges to keep you focused and motivated!

name: Sketch Magician
summary: A sketch action game where you fight with your drawings. You are a Sketch Magician. From arrow-like attacks to shields that block enemy attacks, everything is created from your sketches. Fight in the world of the sketchbook!

name: Skydance's Behemoth: Rites of Wrath
summary:
Test your hand-to-hand combat against waves of enemies, battling day and night across three maps (two new, plus a refined version of the one from the beta). Along the way, you’ll collect coins from your fallen enemies and trade them for powerful new Golden Weapons. There are 15 Golden Weapons in all, each with unique powers for players to discover and master. Just be careful—weapons have a habit of breaking at inopportune moments in the Arena.

With randomized maps and encounters, no two Arena Mode runs will ever be the same. And once you conquer the Arena all the way through, you’ll unlock Endless Mode, the true test of a warrior’s strength.

In addition to Arena Mode, the Rites of Wrath update also includes The Behemoth Trials. Got a favorite Behemoth you enjoy taking down? Or one that really tests your skills? The Behemoth Trials enables players to take on any Behemoth at any time—or even a series of Behemoths—with no preamble. Preset loadouts maximize your likelihood of success, but don’t let that lull you into a false sense of security. This ancient ritual is still a challenge for all but the bravest.

name: Skull Hotel
summary: A first-person horror game where you clean haunted hotel rooms while evading deadly entities. Inspect hiding spots carefully, listen for warning sounds, and spot subtle clues left by monsters. Your vigilance is your only weapon in this terrifying housekeeping shift.

name: Sky Patch
summary: A peaceful 3D farming platformer and puzzle adventure where players must revitalize quiet, floating islands.

name: Sky Reclaimers
summary: Sky Reclaimers is a real time strategy game where you command a fleet of aerial craft and wage war across the skies! Build zeppelins, gunships, and laser machines to battle fearsome dragons and rival enemy commanders. Harvest resources, build and micro manage your airships!

name: SkyRig
summary: Build floating automated rigs in a volatile gas giant. Extract elements, synthesize compounds, and descend through atmospheric layers in this sci-fi systems-builder focused on chemistry, engineering, and survival.

name: Skibi's Castle TD 2
summary: Skibi's Castle TD 2 is a colorful, sticker-themed tower defense game by the original development team. Summon troops, fend off waves of enemies, and purchase new towers and upgrades. Compete with friends on the leaderboards. Stay tuned for new features coming soon!

name: Sky Fields: Goober Gardens
summary: Sky Fields Goober Gardens is a Voxel, Creature Collector, Idler. Raise, trade, breed Goobers and watch them grow! Don’t forget to pet your Goobers! Use your Goobers to turn your Island into a luscious haven, building an environment for them to flourish.

name: Skyline Urban Story
summary: Starting from a small village and growing into a megacity with a million population, this is a city-simulation game that integrates systems such as demand, plot price, wealth, and special zones. It has a high degree of manageability and is suitable for urban-construction and management enthusiasts.

name: Skaldsong
summary: A free-to-play, singleplayer/multiplayer RPG reminiscent of TTRPGs mixed with MUD games but with content generated by an AI Game Master.

name: Sky and Ground Assault: Call of Warzone & Fighter Aces Bundle
Sky Die
summary: Sky Die is a 2D brawl that drops two-to-four players from tall heights, quickly approaching the bottom. Will you be the first to reach the finish line? Or will you succumb to traps scattered around the skies?

name: Skull Horde
summary: Skull Horde is an auto battler dungeon crawler where you play as a flying skull necromancer. Find powerful loot and create overpowered builds. Summon a horde of skeletons in a battle of bone versus flesh!

name: Skyvern
summary: Rocket-lance your way through a high-speed action platformer where every second counts. You have 60 minutes to save a magicpunk kingdom—no pause, no mercy. Explore, fight, and choose your path to one of many endings before time runs out.

name: Skelly Screamer
summary: Use your microphone to control an undead skeleton! The louder you speak, the faster he goes! Conquer obstacles, enemies, and puzzles and climb higher towards the top of the world!

name: SkyTaxi
summary: Navigate a vibrant cyberpunk world in SkyTaxi, a futuristic game where you manage flying taxis, dodge rising dangers, and solve dynamic challenges. Explore colorful cityscapes, transport passengers, and master innovative mechanics in this thrilling aerial adventure.

name: Skill Hockey
summary: ``Skill Hockey'' is a super exciting new air hockey game where you enter commands during play to activate flashy special moves and drive the puck into your opponent's goal!

name: Skybound Saga
summary: Skybound Saga is a sandbox RPG where you explore floating islands, build skybases, craft powerful gear, and reshape the world block by block. Adventure above the clouds awaits!

name: Skate It
summary: Skate It on DS and iOS is a skateboarding game where players use touch controls (and buttons on DS) to perform tricks and complete challenges in different skate parks. The game includes character customization and focuses on exploring environments and achieving objectives through skateboarding moves.

name: Sketchy Individuals
summary: Can you successfully match descriptions to drawings, then drawings to suspects?

name: Skull-Rung
summary: Laura's landed the job of her dreams as junior partner to Amy, a trailblazing marketing exec. Laura's convinced she's finally going to make her name and escape the grey mire her life has become. Amy has other plans. A workplace thriller intended for adult audiences. Submitted to the Toxic Yuri VN Jam 2025.

name: Sky Saviour
summary:
Defend the futuristic city of NeoCov from bizarre alien insect invaders! Your mission is to intercept and eliminate the enemies before they reach the city center.

Use the fire button to shoot down the alien threats, but there's a catch, you can only carry 7 shells at a time. To reload, descend into NeoCov city center. Drop down into NeoCov city centre to reload, beware however, whilst in the city you are unable to shoot.

name: Sky Kid: Enhanced
summary: A graphical enhancement of the NES game Sky Kid. Everything was redone to make the game look less childish and more realistic.

name: Skyfire: Death From Above
summary: Build and upgrade your flying castle, defend yourself against enemy hordes and explore a medieval post-apocalyptic world. Experience the fusion of Bullet Heaven, and real time strategy. In a world where machines have taken over, mankind has taken to the skies.

name: Skoof Fishing
summary: Fishing has never been a boring activity and it has never been so fun and immersive before! Join the ranks of true skoofs, catch fish and have fun.

name: SkyRunner
summary: A fast-paced first-person platformer with combat and style. Wall-run, jump, slide, and grapple through the skies with mind-melting speed and a set of powerful abilities.Master your movement and destroy anything in your path.

name: Sketchy Driver
summary: An arcade, roguelike endless racer where you dodge traffic, jump ramps, perform tricks, earn points, and level up to make the run more entertaining, aiming for the best score. No story. No brakes. No problem.

name: Skateboarding
summary: Skateboarding is an anaglyph 3D skateboard game.

name: Sketchbook
summary: Sketchbook is a first-person horror game with interesting puzzles and mechanics. Dive into your memories to deal with your inner monsters and discover the truth.

name: Sketchy Arcade
summary: Chill out and play some sketchy games in this casual 3D arcade simulator! Jump between pinball, mini golf, retro space shooters, platformers, experimental demos, and much more as you win tickets and collect prizes. Customize your world, unlock new features, and compete for high scores!

name: Skyline Bowling: Spooky Style
summary:
With this DLC, You'll unlock:
3 powerful balls: Clown, Scarecrow and Reaper!
A Grimshard T-Shirt for better accuracy!
Pyrothread Gloves for extra spin!
Emberwalk Shoes for more speed!
1K gems to buy new gear!
150K coins to upgrade your gear!

name: Skyline Bowling: Sweet Style
summary:
With this DLC, You'll unlock:
3 powerful balls: Sting, Wing and Hive!
A Beeheart T-Shirt for better accuracy!
Buzzwrap Gloves for extra spin!
Honeyglide Shoes for more speed!
5K gems to buy new gear!
50K coins to upgrade your gear!

name: Skeleton Dungeon
summary: Explore the dungeon and defeat the Skeleton King!

name: Skewer of Heroes
summary: Bubble Survivor is a hack-and-slash game that combines Roguelike elements with team-based gameplay. You will summon like-minded heroes to conquer challenges and defeat the malevolent slimes, restoring light to the world!

name: Skyborn: IronWings
summary: A reimagined 3D arcade shooter that transforms the classic vertical scrolling formula with full spatial depth, immersive air-to-ground combat, and intense bullet hell action.

name: Sky Legends: An Aeropostal Epic
summary: Play as the iconic pioneers of aviation and fly their legendary aircraft. Between human challenges and technical feats, cross the extreme landscapes of the Sahara, the Andes, or the Atlantic in an immersive, narrative, and historical virtual reality adventure.

name: Skull8
summary: Explore a labyrinth of procedurally generated levels in search of mysterious fragments and eight forgotten relics. Death means starting over, but knowledge is your greatest weapon.

name: Skiers Landing
summary: With a pair of Skis or a Snowboard, survive the fast trails in Europe, Japan and Australia. Rescue people while you find lost animals to help you carve, jump and race down the mountain to the finish line!

name: Skeleton Farmer
summary: A short surreal game where you grow wheat to bake into a loaf of bread.

name: Sky City Rush
summary: An action-packed racing game where you unlock tracks, master cars with unique stats, and compete in elimination, time trial, and classic races.

name: SkinCrawler Ranch
summary: SkinCrawler Ranch is a Campy Horror FPS Cryptid Hunting Adventure. A camping trip, turned bad trip. Now it’s up to you to defend your well-endowed gothic girlfriend from the Cryptid Horrors!

name: Skibidi Jeffrey: I Want to Cum Inside Femboy Hitler
summary: One night on your way to a date, you accidentally turn a guy into roadkill. Now it’s up to you to hide the body, keep your cool, and still rizz the femboy of your dreams—before he finds the corpse.

name: Sky Resort: Delphi & Jessy
summary: Put yourself in the shoes of Sky's Resort manager, the kinkiest resort on Earth where everything and everyone goes. Take care of your guests, their fetishes, and make sure that they'll enjoy their stay!

name: Skate 3: San Van Party Pack
summary: The party is on! Revisit some old San Van favorites along with a massive new park and get your creative Zen flowing with a new Skate.Park lot. Party Play is back so get ready for some head to head skating in Spot Battle, 1-UP, SKATE and HOM!

name: Skate 3: Maloof Money Cup 2010 NYC Pack
summary: Compete in one of skateboarding’s biggest annual contests. For the first time ever, the Maloof Money Cup travels east to New York where you'll skate the course and battle with some of skating’s heaviest hitters in fierce competition for the ultimate purse.

name: Skyguard
summary: Hordes of robot marauders have been attacking airships en route to the city. Join the Skyguard and shoot bots, buy guns, and fly your way to victory (and a paycheck) in this action-packed, couch co-op, third-person shooter.

name: Skeleton Runner
summary: 2.5 platformer game where player character is skeleton character. 9 different levels where player need solve different puzzles and make accurate jumps to reach star which is end of every level. Falling from a height kills player.

name: Skuf vs Beer Bottle Party
summary: Once again, the thirst for alcohol drives him

name: Skuf For Altushki
summary: Welcome to the world of skufs and altushkas! In this game, it's not the skufs who have to look for altushki, but the altushki of the skufs.

name: Skyeisle Cube
summary: In the colorful world of "Skyeisle Cube," become Michelangelo to precisely remove the superfluous, sculpt time, and find order in chaos. Reveal hidden beauty and let art blossom at your fingertips.

name: Skat 3D Premium
summary: Realistic 3D Skat simulation with singleplayer, multiplayer and tutorial. With configurable AI strength and many adjustable rule and game variants you can start exciting Skat tournaments - or just play for fun!

name: Skylax! The Lab Runner
summary: Skylax! The Lab Runner is an FPS game that presents you with tight gameplay and good mechanics. In the game, you can pass levels either by hiding using the invisible mechanic or by fighting against enemies. And after each level you will upgrade your weapons and utilities!

name: Skyward Masters
summary: Skyward Masters is inspired by the hit game mode Bedwars and established first-person shooters, combining the best of multiple games into a new action-packed FPS title. 4 teams will battle on floating islands in a thrilling and ever-changing environment to be the last team standing.

name: Skullgirls: Season 1 Pass
summary:
The first ever Skullgirls Season Pass! Discover 4 brand new characters (including stages, palettes, and Story Mode) and the Skullgirls Soundtrack all bundled together at a discounted price!

The Season 1 Pass includes:
- DLC: Annie of the Stars
- DLC: Umbrella
- DLC: Black Dahlia
- DLC: Marie
- Season Pass Exclusive Palette Pack
- DLC: Skullgirls Original Soundtrack

name: Skinfreak
summary: The city’s most disturbing serial killer is at large and has his sights set on Belle. Can she escape this maniac’s fleshy, rotting clutches? Or will she lose her skin to this sicko’s collection?

name: Skullbreaker
summary: Skullbreaker is an Arkanoid game where you have to help the skeleton return to the tower and regain its rightful place at the top

name: Skyline
summary: Clicker with good music and any choice you make can change your gameplay, you also have autoplay, you don't need to use the mouse, but you lose the chance to see all the secrets in the game (you can get all the achievements with autoplay) + WOMANS + ECONOMY + WORKSHOP + CHAT + VOICE CHAT

name: Sky Love Girls: Flight Attendant Crush
summary: Step on board and meet charming flight attendants. Can you capture the hearts of the cabin crew?

name: Sky Love Boys: Flight Attendant Crush
summary: Step on board and meet charming male flight attendants. Can you capture the hearts of the cabin crew?

name: Skyborne Chronicles
summary: Build, manage, and defend a flying city in this 2D isometric survival city builder. Balance resources and workers to keep humanity aloft for a century in an alternate post–World War I timeline.

name: Skies Scrapper
summary: Advancer Simulator about building up and reaching the sky

name: Skigill
summary: Fight! Collect! Explore! Experiment! Survive! Master the Skigill, a large skill tree spanning the entire battleground, to power your character and survive waves of enemies. Unlock upgrades, weapons, and characters in a meta sigil after each game, and maybe you'll see the end!

name: Skerda Armor
summary: Skerda Armor is a bizarre soulslike set in a distant grotesque world of concrete jungles and strange rural lands.

name: Sky World 64
summary: Take a trip to Nostalgia Land in this cozy themed sandbox game that harkens back to the 64-bit era. This survival experience takes heavy inspiration from Minecraft’s Skyblock, where you start on a floating island with minimal resources and, over time, can turn your island into a world full of life!

name: Ski Zone
summary: Prepare yourself, skier! In this fast-paced arcade game, you'll be sliding down an endless hill with only one button!

name: Skull Port
summary: A strategic digital board game adaptation. Roll the dice, manipulate the roll outcomes, and place Influence tokens to outmaneuver opponents.

name: Ski Jumping World Cup
summary: Take flight in Ski Jumping World Cup - a true ski jumping adventure that takes you to legendary hills across the globe. From snowy peaks in Scandinavia to wind-swept arenas in Japan and record-breaking runs in the USA, every leap demands focus, precision, and nerves of steel.

name: Skewer Squad
summary: Become the ULTIMATE Grill Master! Pick your favorite foods and seasonings to build your Skewer Squad. Drag, shoot, and bounce to keep those sneaky critters away from your precious grill!

name: Skinwalker
summary: Skinwalker is a horror adventure escape game that takes place in a frozen wilderness where every second counts. Trapped alone in a dark, merciless forest, your only lifeline is the fire that keeps you warm against the bitter cold. However, the freezing night isn't your only enemy. A terrifying creature known as the Skinwalker lurks nearby, hiding among the wildlife and waiting for you to let your guard down.

name: Skellet
summary:
Skellet wakes up alone, in a cruel mansion.

Explore the deep dark, see if you can wake from this nightmare.

name: Skinwalker: First Blood
summary: Skinwalker is a hack n’ slash action platformer where you swear allegiance to a formidable beast to save your daughter from a terminal illness. Shapeshift into the creature’s monstrous form and wield untamed wrath in exchange for its freedom and the promise of a cure.

name: Sky Resort 2
summary: Put yourself once more in the shoes of Sky's Resort manager, the kinkiest resort on Earth where everything and anything goes. Take care of your guests, their fetishes, and ensure they'll enjoy their stay!

name: Skibidi Mahrt Kart: TrackMahrnia
summary:
A competitive racing game featuring new and familiar sites from the Skibidi Mahr Universe!
Try beating the gold times in Time Trial, test your endurance in Marathon Mode or release some steam whilst exploring the free roam and all its mysteries...

name: Skate Style
summary: Skate Style is the next-generation skateboarding game! Create and share your style with your friends using the built-in animation editor. The game blends high-fidelity graphics and cutting edge animation techniques with an advanced character creator giving you full creative freedom. Whether you're hitting iconic street spots in Barcelona or flowing lines at Stalin Skate Plaza in Prague, every trick, every replay, and every style is yours to define.

name: Skinwalkers Valley
summary: In Skinwalkers Valley, a routine hunting expedition with Ethan and his dog Ranger transforms into a survival horror experience when supernatural forces emerge from the forest depths. The game follows their journey as they encounter unexplained phenomena in the woods, shifting from a standard hunting trip to a fight for survival against mysterious entities drawn from Native American folklore.

name: Skarven
summary: Fallow fields birth strange life. Battle botanical abominations and a fanatical militant cult as you journey through a dark and distorted vision of the Danish countryside. Experience deep lore, thick atmosphere, and razor sharp mechanics in this raw yet refined classical narrative FPS.

name: Skald: Against the Black Priory - Deluxe Edition
summary: Skald: Against the Black Priory Deluxe Edition contains the base game as well as the full, official soundtrack composed by Romanus Surt and the Reinforcement Pack.

name: Skytail
summary:
Living among the clouds with your legendary birdlike companion, your idyllic life is shattered when corrupted fiends steal your Skytail’s offspring. Now you must harness the telekinetic powers of the ancients and take to the skies in a daring rescue.

Wield a wide range of telekinetic abilities using elegant gesture controls. Crush foes, tear them apart, or charge them up and hurl them around for devastating impact.

name: Skuf na dachie
summary: A cottage is not just about garden beds! Dacha is primarily a solitude with oneself. Flood the sauna, go mushroom picking, and ride an old bucket over the village potholes in an immersive country simulator.

name: Skirmish
summary: Skirmish, a BBC Micro and Electron game, adapts the classic Joust formula into a two-player experience where knights mounted on flying ostriches and storks battle against AI-controlled vulture riders. Players navigate platforms while using aerial combat tactics, striking opponents from above to turn them into eggs that must be destroyed before hatching into stronger foes. The game features three enemy types - Bounders, Hunters, and Shadow Lords - along with environmental hazards including crumbling platforms, lava trolls, and an invincible pterodactyl.

name: Skybound
summary: Skybound is a 3D exploration platformer focused on fun, fluid movement mechanics, parkour and environmental puzzle solving.

name: Skin Tailor
summary: Skin Tailor is a medieval horror dress up game and visual novel hybrid. Skin your supernatural enemies, create disguises and infiltrate vampire owned blood farms to rescue your comrades.

name: Sky Reach
summary: Sky Reach is a neon cyberpunk infinite climber where every jump counts. Shoot energy waves, collide with the world to create platforms, and carve your own route upward. Play solo or in local co-op and push for ever-higher scores.

name: Sker Ritual: Dead by Nightfall
summary: It’s a full moon! Shift into Dead by Nightfall, featuring two new masks alongside a Premium menu background and more!

name: Skam
summary: Earn glory as you skam Westerners for the nation of Plövka in SKAM, the phone scam game.

name: Skuld
summary: Skuld is an action tower defense set in the Nine Realms of Norse mythology. Play as Skuld, a Norn chosen by the threads of fate to become a Valkyrie and defend the realms from Hela's shadow, combining agile combat, tactical turrets, and divine powers against waves of corrupted mythical creatures.

name: Skyborne Terrors
summary: "Skyborne Terrors" is a unique horror game where you navigate dangerous, dense skies using a mechanical aircraft. But the skies are far from empty! Demonic balloons haunt the skies, hunting for fresh victims!

name: Skinwalker
summary: A 3–6 player online horror game of deception and survival. Explore a maze and uncover the hidden Skinwalker before it’s too late. Use tools, voice chat, and evidence to expose the killer among you.

name: Skyward Bastion
summary: Skyward Bastion is a tower defense roguelite set on floating islands. Build and upgrade your defenses, survive endless waves of enemies, and explore procedurally expanding maps under a living day-night cycle.

name: SkyDrop
summary: Drop into a world where you and your friends can engage in eliminating players, and monsters. There are community trophies to collect all around for you to find but just know that they are not easy to achieve. Good luck out there and have fun.

name: Skyward
summary: "Skyward" is a 3D action roguelike game with deck-building mechanics. You can create various builds by combining different classes, equipment, and skills. You will play as a traveler, defeating powerful enemies and uncover the secrets behind the fall of the sky kingdom.

name: SkySavior Helicopter Services
summary: Save the city from chaos! In the game, the player takes on the role of a helicopter pilot fulfilling objectives transmitted by the operations center.

name: Sky Mates
summary: Sky Mates is a turn-based, multiplayer-only 1v1 tactics game in which you assemble a team of deadly steampunk pirates to gain control over a crumbling airship.

name: Skate Bums
summary: No skateboarding skills? No fear!
